This is Annabel, 43, a resident of Tondo, Philippines. She is married to Rodel, a welder, and mother to their children. She, together with her husband and children, manages their household while operating the business. At this time, she is working hard to continually provide income for their everyday expenses.

Annabel sells frozen and processed foods. She has a factory a few steps from her house where they manufacture the meat products. She earns by selling her goods to her neighbors and to suppliers. Her regular customers are her neighbors and the local community. She earns a minimum of PHP 600 in sales every day.

To help her continue operations of her business, she is requesting a PHP 12,000 loan. She will be utilizing the loan to buy additional processed and frozen meat products to expand her product inventory.

Annabel hopes that her business will flourish and dreams of giving her children good lives and educations. She meets up with her co-fellowship* members to share stories of her work every week and where she can also draw strength and inspiration from the Word of God she studies.

* All CCT community partners / clients are organized into fellowship groups that meet on a weekly basis. A fellowship group is composed of 15 to 30 community partners. The fellowship groups gather each week to study the Word of God, build social capital, and repay Micro Finance loans.

loans.use: to pay for additional processed and frozen meat products to expand her product inventory.

loans.name: Jyldyzgul

texts.ru: Жылдызгул 38 лет, замужем, вместе с супругом воспитывают 4 детей. Жылдызгул спокойная, целеустремленная, честная женщина. У Жылдызгул - среднее образование, в качестве основного дохода для своей семьи Жылдызгул занимается животноводством, стартовав 16 лет назад, с покупки скота на 5,000 сом KGS. Благодаря упорному труду Жылдызгул, в ее хозяйстве на сегодняшний день имеется: 4 дойные коровы, 2 лошади, 25 овец. По хозяйству помогает супруг и дети, также основной профессией супруга является частное строительство. Он подрабатывает частным строителем и приносит в дом небольшие доходы. Ежемесячный семейный доход составляет 10,000 сом (KGS). В целях дальнейшего развития своего хозяйства, Жылдызгул обратилась в Микрофинансовый банк «Бай –Тушум и Партнеры» за кредитом в сумме 100,000 сом (KGS) на покупку коров для увеличения поголовья скота. Доходы от кредита Жылдызгул планирует вложить в дальнейшее приумножение количества домашней скотины, и планирует накопить средства на ремонт дома.
texts.en:
Jyldyzgul is 38 years old and married.  She and her husband are raising four children.  She is a very calm, honest and goal-oriented woman.  She has a secondary education and is involved in animal husbandry, an activity which provides her family with its main source of income.  She started in this business 16 years ago with the purchase of cattle for 5,000 som (KGS).  Thanks to her hard work, she now owns four dairy cows, two horses and 25 sheep.  Her husband and children help her to run the business.  Beside helping his wife, her husband also works as a private building contractor and brings a small income home.  The family makes a monthly income of 10,000 som (KGS).  

In order to further develop her farming business, Jyldyzgul has turned to the microfinance bank "Bai Tushum & Partners" for a loan of 100,000 som (KGS).  She will use her loan to buy some cows to increase her cattle headcount.  She plans to re-invest the profits from this loan back into her business by purchasing additional livestock. She is also planning to save enough money to repair her house.

loans.use: to buy cows.

loans.name: Carmelita

texts.en:
Carmelita is 60 years old and married with eight children.

Carmelita works hard to provide for her family. She runs a general store in the Philippines and requested a PHP 10,000 loan through NWTF to buy more items like candies, snack foods, canned goods, shampoo, fabric conditioner, etc. to sell.

Carmelita has borrowed and paid 13 loans from NWTF before this loan. She has been running the general store for seven years and also earns additional income from buying and selling bananas.

Carmelita aspires to save money to expand her business.

loans.use: to buy more items like candies, snack foods, canned goods, shampoo, fabric conditioner, etc. to sell

loans.name: Lorna

texts.en:
Lorna is 43 years old and widowed with three children, who are all in shool. Lorna works very hard to provide for them.

Lorna runs a general store in the Philippines and requested a PHP 6,000 loan through NWTF in order to purchase more stock of groceries to sell.

Lorna has been in this business for three years and sells a variety of items, such as bread, soft drinks, and other groceries. 

In the future, Lorna would like to save enough money so she could afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to purchase more stock of groceries to sell

loans.name: Nena

texts.en:
Nena is a hardworking entrepreneur who has a bakery business in the Philippines. 

She is borrowing PHP 6,000 through NWTF to purchase ingredients like flour, salt, yeast, sugar, butter, etc. for her bakery business.

Nena has been in this business for 2 years. She also earns more income from buying and selling dried fish.

Nena has been sustaining her business activities through her own efforts with the help of the loans from NWTF. She dreams of saving money to expand her business in the future.

loans.use: to purchase ingredients like flour, salt, yeast, sugar, butter, etc. for her bakery

loans.name: Norwelyn

texts.en:
Norwelyn is 32 years old and married with three children, two of whom are in school. She is a very hardworking entrepreneur.

Norwelyn has a rice retailing business in the Philippines. She requested a PHP 6,000 loan amount through NWTF in order to purchase more stock of rice to sell.

Norwelyn has been in this business for two years. In the future, she would like to save enough money so she can afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to purchase more stock of rice to sell

loans.name: José David

texts.es:
José de 48 años de edad, esta casado y tiene 3 hijos, estudio noveno grado y luego se dedico al trabajo en el campo, ya que sus padres no pudieron darle mas estudio, aprendió el oficio de agricultor desde que tenia 10 años, ya que sus padres siempre se dedicaron a esta actividad; fue lo único que le pudieron enseñar.

José se levanta a las 5 :00 AM, lleva los animales al potrero, para lo cual camina un kilómetro, luego se dedica a sus cultivos de maíz y yucales, por la tarde regresa a casa con sus animales. 

Para comprar sus novillos de engorde, viaja en un camión de los que salen de su comunidad hasta el tiangue, el viaje tarda 40 minutos, al llegar observa con mucho cuidado, hasta conseguir los mejores novillos, al realizar la compra que puede tardar medio día, viaja de regreso a casa.  

El préstamo que esta solicitando a Fundación Campo, es para comprar 4 novillos de engorde en repasto y algunos insumos para beneficiar 14,000 metros cuadrados de maíz y 7,000 de yuca, ya que siembra en invierno y en verano siembra con su sistema de riego.   

Con la inversión,  podrá incrementar el lote de novillos, esto será de mucho beneficio, ya que las ventas de ganado serán mas continuas y por consiguiente, sus ingresos aumentaran para seguir trabajando.  Esta seguro que teniendo mayores ingresos, podrá trabajar por mucho tiempo, para aportar a su familia todo lo necesario para subsistir 

Esta planificando ahorrar, para dar estudio a sus hijos y que sean profesionales, para que tengan una mejor calidad de vida.
texts.en:
José is 48 years old, married and has three children. He finished ninth grade and then began working in the fields because his parents were unable to pay for more studies. He had learned how to farm since  he was 10 years old because his parents always made a living as farmers and that was all they knew how to teach him. 

José gets up at 5 a.m. and takes his animals to pasture. He has to walk a kilometer and then he devotes himself to his corn and cassava fields; in the afternoon he returns home with his animals.

In order to purchase steers to fatten, he travels in one of the lorries that depart from his area to the street market, a trip that takes 40 minutes. Upon arriving he very carefully observes so that he can select the best steers. After he makes his purchase, which can take half a day, he returns home.

The loan he is requesting from Fundación Campo is to buy 4 steers to fatten in pasture and some supplies to cultivate 14,000 sq. meters of corn and 7,000 of cassava because he plants in the winter as well as the summer, when he uses his irrigation system.

With his investment he will be able to increase his herd of steers. This will be of great benefit since his cattle sales will be more continuous and therefore his income will increase so that he can continue working. He is sure that having more income will enable him to work for a long time and to give his family all they need to subsist.

He is planning to save so that he can educate his children to become professionals and they will have a better quality of life.

loans.use: to buy 4 steers to fatten in pasture and some supplies to cultivate 14,000 sq. meters of corn and 7,000 sq. meters of cassava.

loans.name: Rafael

texts.es:
El Sr. Rafael tiene  37  años, es de la ciudad de San Lorenzo, él es dueño de una despensa  donde atiende  con su esposa, se dedica a este negocio desde hace tres años, y ya se pudo formar una buena clientela.
La pareja tiene 3 hijas en edad escolar, donde todas ellas ayudan en el negocio, fomentando así el trabajo de toda la familia.
Rafael pide de este crédito para poder invertirlo en la compra de insumos para su despensa, como ser verduras, frutas, carnes, panificados y demás insumos para poder seguir con sus ventas y así seguir luchando por su familia.
texts.en:
Sr. Rafael is 37 years old and from the city of San Lorenzo. He is the owner of a food pantry that he manages with his wife. This business has been in existence for three years and he has been able to establish a good clientele. His wife has three school-age daughters and they all help with the business.

Rafael is requesting this loan so that he can invest in the purchase of supplies for his business such as vegetables, fruits, meats, baked goods, and other products. This will enable him to continue his sales and keep striving on behalf of his family.

loans.use: to buy vegetables, fruits, meats, baked goods, and other products to sell.

loans.name: Angel

texts.es: Angel agradece a todos los inversionitas por el apoyo y se siente contento por el crédito anterior, él socio continua viviendo en la ciudad de Pilcopata y con el negocio de venta materiales de construcción como por ejemplo cemento, arena, piedra, calaminas, fierros y también alquila dormitorios. Ya son varios años que se dedica a la venta de materiales de construcción y le va muy bien gracias al empeño que pone en su trabajo, él es una persona emprendedora y trabajadora que pertenece al banco comunal “Paititi”. En esta oportunidad requiere el préstamo para hacer mantenimiento de las habitaciones ósea desea comprar pintura. Agradece y valora el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con el pago de sus cuotas mensuales.
texts.en:
Angel is thankful to all the investors for the support and feels pleased with the previous lender; the associate still lives in the city of Pilcopata and has the business selling construction materials such as for example cement, sand, stone, corrugated iron, metal and also rents out rooms.

They have been selling construction materials for years now and it has gone very well thanks to the will power he applies in his work.  He is a real go-getter and a hard worker who is a member of the communal bank "Paititi".

This time he's requesting the loan to do maintenance to his rooms; specifically he wants to buy paint.  He is thankful and appreciative for the loan and promises to fulfill the repayment in its monthly installments.

loans.use: buy paint.

loans.name: Luis Ronald

texts.es:
Luis Ronald tiene 30 años de edad, vive junto a su hijo y su madre, en el distrito de Pucará, su población se dedica al cultivo de frutas, maíz y café a dos horas de la ciudad de Jaén, que se encuentra ubicado en la región Cajamarca, sierra norte del Perú.

El se dedica a la cría y comercio de cerdos, gallinas, patos, ganado vacuno que lo ofrece en el mercado de la zona.

Ha solicitado un préstamo a Edpyme Alternativa de 3 000 nuevos soles para construir corrales para una granja de cerdos y así tener una mejor producción para ofrecer a sus clientes.
texts.en: Luis Ronald, 30, lives with his son and his mother in the Pucará district, where the residents grow corn and coffee. It is about two hours from Jaén, Cajamarca in the northern mountains of Peru. Luis raises pigs, hens, turkeys, and cattle to sell at the local market. He has applied to Edpyme Alternativa for a loan of 3000 nuevos soles to build pig pens so that he can increase his stock to offer customers.

loans.use: to build pig pens.

loans.name: Silvia Elena

texts.es: Silvia tiene 52 años de edad nació y creció hasta la edad de los 10 años en la comunidad de villa nueva. después su familia se traslado a vivir en la comunidad de potosí esta era una zona donde se producía mucho el algodón y donde su familia trabajaba en eso ,al pasar de los años ella creció y se caso formando su  propia familia , se dedico a trabajar en una camaronera en el área de cocina , ya que se separo del padre de sus hijos  con su esfuerzo logro sacarlos  adelante a sus dos hijos pues ser madre y padre a la vez es difícil pero con la ayuda de Dios nada es imposible, su hijo mayor la apoya bastante ya que tienen unas manzanas de tierra ahí siembran maíz y frijoles que les sirve para  consumo del hogar y cuando la cosecha es buena también venden su par de quintales de la cosecha.En la comunidad no hay energía electrifica,por las noches se alumbran con candiles o candelas , su sueño es tener energía en su hogar  es por eso que esta haciendo este tramite de crédito para comprar un sistema solar para su humilde hogar
texts.en: Silvia is 52 years old. She was born and lived until she was 10 years old in the community of  Villa Nueva. After that, her family moved to live in the community of Potosí. This is an area where a lot of cotton is produced and her family worked in that. Over the years she grew up and married and started her own family. She worked at a shrimp farm as a cook, since she separated from the father of her children. With her hard work, she was able to get her two children ahead. Being a mother and a father at the same time is difficult, but with God's help, nothing is impossible. Her oldest son helps her a lot, as they have some plots of land where they grow corn and beans that they use for household consumption. When the harvest is good, they also sell a couple of quintals of the harvest. In the community there is no electricity, but at night they use candles or lanterns. Her dream is to have power in her home and that is why she is taking out this loan to buy a solar system for her humble home.

loans.use: to buy a solar system for her home.

loans.name: Leifa Del Carmen

texts.es:
En Mejía localizada a unos pocos kilómetros de la ciudad de Portoviejo ciudad de gente dedicada en gran parte a la agricultura, al cultivo y venta de cocos se reúnen cada quince días el Banco Comunal Mejía.
En este lugar vive la señora Leifa, tiene 50 años de edad, está casada y tiene 4 hijos ya todos mayores de edad e independientes, con ella vive  un nieto de 8 años que es como si fuera su hijo ya que lo crio desde pequeño, el estudia en escuela. Su esposo trabaja en la agricultura.
Doña Leifa es una ama de casa que para ayudar a solventar los gastos del hogar ha tenido que dedicarse a la cría  de pollos, cada tres meses compra los pollos cuando están pequeños los tiene por dos o tres meses y una vez que tengan un peso adecuado los vende ya sea en pie  o por libras, entrega a comerciantes  y también vende por su casa a vecinos del lugar, compra los pollos en una incubadora en Portoviejo, ella ya lleva más de 15 años dedicada a esto y le gusta porque se gana algo sin salir de su casa y con un trabajo mínimo.
Este crédito es para comprar más pollos y alimentos para los mismos ya que se viene la época de Navidad y Año Nuevo y en estos días se vende bastante y a buen precio. Está en el Banco Comunal hace 10 años y le gusta por la ayuda para salir adelante. Sus sueños son tener otro galpón para meter más pollos.
texts.en:
The Mejía Communal Bank meets every two weeks in Mejía, located a few kilometers from the city of Portoviejo, where most people are farmers.

Leifa lives here.  She is 50 years old, married, and has four adult children on their own.  Her eight year old grandson lives with her as if he was her son, and she has raised him since birth.  He attends school.  Her husband is a farmer.

Leifa is a housewife who helps with the household expenses by raising chickens.  She buys chicks every three months, raises them for two or three months and sells them by weight or by piece when they reach the optimum size.  She delivers to merchants and also sells to her neighbors out of her home.  She buys her chicks from an incubator in Portoviejo and has been doing this for 15 years.  She likes it because she earns some money without having to leave her home.

She will use the money from this loan to buy more chicks, since the Christmas and New Year season is coming and she makes more sales at good prices.  She has been with the communal bank for 10 years and she likes the help she gets so she can come out ahead.  Her dreams are to have another chicken coup and more chickens.

loans.use: to buy chicks.

loans.name: Arnaldo

texts.es:
Arnaldo tiene 69 años de edad, vive junto a sus dos hijos en el distrito de La Matanza, su población se dedica al cultivo de frutales, comercio de animales y transporte, a dos horas de la ciudad de Piura, costa norte del Perú.

El se dedica a la crianza y comercialización de ganado vacuno, es muy conocido en la zona por la actividad que realiza, ha solicitado un préstamo de 2000 nuevos soles para comprar una vaca lechera y ofrecer su leche en el mercado de la zona y de esta manera generar mayores ingresos para su familia.
texts.en:
Arnaldo is 69 years old. He lives with his two children in the La Matanza district. The people there grow fruit, raise animals and work in transportation. It is two hours from the city of Piura, on the northern coast of Peru.

He works raising and selling dairy cattle. He is well known in the area because of the activity he does. He has asked for a loan of 2000 nuevos soles to buy a dairy cow and offer milk at the area market so that he can generate more income for his family.

loans.use: to buy a dairy cow.

loans.name: Mary Bebelu

texts.es:
Mary Berbeleu tiene 30 años de edad, vive junto a sus hijos en la zona rural de Oyotun, su población se dedica al cultivo de arroz, yucas, maíz a dos horas de la ciudad de Chiclayo, costa norte del Perú.

Ella se dedica a la crianza y venta de cerdos y pavos en la parte posterior a su domicilio, nos explica que se dedica a esta actividad desde que se caso para apoyar con los gastos de la familia, su esposo brinda servicios de albañilería.

Ha solicitado un préstamo de 1 000 nuevos soles para terminar los acabados de su cocina, reposteros, ventanas y una puerta y de esta manera tener un lugar limpio y seguro para preparar los alimentos a su familia.
texts.en: Mary Berbeleu, 30, lives with her children in rural Oyotun, where the residents grow rice, yuca, and corn. It is two hours from the city of Chiclayo on Peru's north coast. Mary raises pigs and turkeys in her backyard to sell later. She says she has been doing this since she got married to help pay household expenses. Her husband is a bricklayer. She has applied for a loan of 1000 nuevos soles to finish her kitchen and buy cabinets, windows, and a door so that the space is clean and she can safely prepare food for her family.

loans.use: to finish her kitchen and buy cabinets, windows, and a door.

loans.name: Albina

texts.en:
Albina is 47 years old and single. She has one child. Albina works hard to provide for her family, running a general store in the Philippines. She has been running the general store for 10 years, and she earns additional income from buying and selling vegetables.

She requested a PHP 5,000 loan through NWTF. She will use the loan to buy additional stock to sell in her general store. Albina has borrowed and repaid two loans from NWTF, before this loan. She aspires to save enough money to expand her business.

loans.use: to buy additional stock to sell in her general store

loans.name: Juan Carlos

texts.es:
Juan de 37 años de edad,solo estudio hasta 7° grado; debido a la pobreza  ya no tuvo la oportunidad de estudiar y se dedico a trabajar. Esta acompañado y su pareja se dedica a cuidar sus dos hijas y tiene una granja de gallinas.     

Juan se dedica a la agricultura desde que tiene 10 años con su papá. Además, es tractorista y motorista eso  fue la necesidad que  lo llevo aprender y fue un amigo que le enseño, tiene 10 años  de ser motorista hoy agradece a ese  amigo porque de eso esta sacando a su familia adelante. Comenta, que para  trabajar en la agricultura se levanta muy temprano a las 4:30AM,  se va para el trabajo a las 5:00AM para llegar donde vive el patrón, tiene que caminar una media hora, luego trabaja 10 horas con el tractor y regresa a casa por la tarde trabaja en la milpa que tiene él        


El préstamo sera utilizado, para la compra de 2 vacas, pues ya va a sacar la milpa y quedara el rastrojo y quiere aprovecharlo.


Su sueño es dejarle a sus hijos una casa, sueña con verlos graduarse en la universidad, ya que el no tuvo la  oportunidad de hacerlo y no quiere que a ellos les pase lo mismo, por eso se esta esforzando para ahorrar y la mejor manera es comprando unas vacas y comenzar a cancelar de la ganancia de la leche y de la agricultura.
texts.en:
Juan, 37, only finished 7th grade and didn't have the chance to continue in school because his family was poor and he had to start working. He has a life partner, who takes care of their two children. Juan has a chicken farm. He began farming at age 10 with his father. He also drives tractors and cars, which required learning the trade from a friend. He has been a driver for 10 years and thanks that friend because he supports his family with this work.

Farming means getting up at 4:30 AM and leaving at 5:00 AM to arrive at his boss's house. He walks for half an hour, works 10 hours on the tractor, and comes home in the afternoon to tend his field. He will use this loan to buy two cows to plow the field, leaving the mulch that he wants to take advantage of.  

He dreams of leaving his children a house and seeing them graduate from college, which he was not able to do. He doesn't want that to happen to them, so he is trying to save. The best way to do this is to buy some cows and start earning money from their milk and from his crops.

loans.use: to buy two cows.

loans.name: Gulumkan

texts.ru: Гулумкан 50 лет, замужем, дети все взрослые, проживают отдельно. У Гулумкан - среднее образование, в качестве основного дохода для своей семьи Гулумкан занимается животноводством, стартовав 30 лет назад, с покупки скота на 1,000 сом KGS. Благодаря упорному труду Гулумкан, в ее хозяйстве на сегодняшний день имеется: 1 дойная корова, 1 лошадь, 12 овец. Ежемесячный доход составляет 5,000 сом (KGS). В целях дальнейшего развития своего хозяйства, Гулумкан обратилась в Микрофинансовый банк «Бай –Тушум и Партнеры» за кредитом в сумме 20,000 сом (KGS) на покупку нетели для увеличения поголовья скота. Доходы от кредита Гулумкан планирует вложить в дальнейшее приумножение количества домашней скотины, и планирует накопить средства на ремонт дома.
texts.en: Gulumkan is 50 years old and married, with grown children that live separately. Gulumkan has a high school education, and she practices animal husbandry as the primary means of supporting her family. She started the business 30 years ago with a purchase of 1,000 som (KGS) of livestock. Thanks to her tireless work, Gulumkan now owns a dairy cow, a horse, and 12 sheep. Her monthly income is 5,000 som (KGS). In order to further develop her business, Gulumkan came to the microfinance bank Bai-Tushum and Partners for a 20,000 som (KGS) loan to buy a heifer to expand her herd. She plans to invest the earnings from use of the loan into further increasing her livestock holdings, and also plans to save money to do repairs to her home.

loans.use: to buy a heifer

loans.name: Nelida

texts.es:
Nélida tiene 34 años es madre soltera de su pequeño hijos de 12 años. Es propietaria de una vivienda construida a base de adobe en donde comparte sus vivencias familiares junto a su pequeño. Su principal oficio es la agricultura y producción de cacao orgánico en su localidad. Acostumbra realizar su trabajo en un terreno que alquila hace varios años  en donde posee una gran variedad de cacao orgánico cuyos frutos requieren toda la atención del caso para obtener a fin de campaña frutos de calidad y venderlos a buen precio. En mas de una ocasión de campaña convoca a trabajadores quienes la apoyan principalmente en las actividades de deshierbo debido a ser muy forzosa y necesaria para permitir que los nutrientes del suelo sean totalmente consumido por los árboles cacaoteros y no por la mala hierba abundante en suelos tropicales. Para esta ocasión acude a su entidad financiera con el objetivo de obtener capital y seguir invirtiendo en sus cultivos. Este es su cuarto préstamo con Kiva y se siente agradecida por el apoyo financiero que recibe para seguir adelante, además se compromete a pagar sus cuotas de manera puntual.
Desea en esta oportunidad contar con 1,000 nuevos soles para la compra de abono orgánico.
texts.en:
Nélida is 34 years old.  She is a single mother to a 12 year old son.  She owns a home made of adobe that she shares with her son.  She works as a farmer, producing organic cacao in her area.  She does her work on land that she has rented for many years where she has a large variety of organic cacao.  Their fruit requires all of her attention in order to have quality crops at the end of the growing season and to sell them at a good price.  On more than one occasion during the season, she hires workers who mainly work doing weeding.  It is necessary to allow the soil nutrients to be consumed only by the cacao trees and not by the weeds, which are abundant in the tropical soil.  

Nélida came to the financial institution with the objective of obtaining capital to continue investing in her crops.  This is her fourth Kiva loan and she is grateful for the financial support that she receives to continue forward.  She promises to make her payments in a punctual manner.  She is requesting 1,000 nuevos soles to purchase organic fertilizer.

loans.use: to purchase organic fertilizer.

loans.name: Sabrina

texts.ru:
Эту милую леди зовут Сабрина. Ей 23 года. Она незамужняя девушка. Сабрина живет с родителями и с младшей сестрой. Сабрина у себя дома берет заказы на шитье национальной женской одежды. Она старается шить свои платья красиво, качественно и без изъяна. Сабрина очень милая, вежливая и добрая девушка. Всегда старается сделать мир лучше. 
   На сегодняшний день Сабрина нуждается в кредите. Она просит помочь купить швейную машинку. Ее старая машинка уже старая и не пригодна для использования. Если она не будет шить, она лишиться источника дохода. Сабрине нужна помощь!
texts.en: This sweet woman is named Sabrina. She is 23 years old; an unmarried girl. Sabrina lives with her parents and younger sister. She sews traditional women's clothing to order from her home. She tries to make her dresses beautiful, of the highest quality, and without flaw. Sabrina is a very sweet, polite, and wonderful woman. She is always trying to make the world better. At this time, Sabrina needs a loan. She is asking for help to buy a sewing machine. Her old machine is already showing its age and isn't suitable for use. If she doesn't sew, she will lose her source of income. Sabrina needs your help!

loans.use: to buy a sewing machine

loans.name: Gulzira

texts.ru: Женщину на фотографии зовут Гулзира. Она замужем. Ей 43 года. Гулзира имеет двух взрослых дочерей. Старшей из них 23 года, младшей 21 год. Ее дети занимаются шитьем национальной одежды. Сама Гулзира занимается земледелием. Она сажает овощи на земельном участке рядом с домом. В такой нелегкой работе ей помогают ее дочери. Сейчас время для посева зимнего урожая и Гулзира активно готовится к посеву. Она хочет посадить картошку, но с начало ей надо обработать землю минеральными удобрениями. Для приобретения нужного количества минеральных удобрений ей не хватает средств, по этой причине Гулзира просит кредит. Она верит, что получит хороший урожай, и ее труды не останутся без награды.
texts.en: The woman in the picture is named Gulzira. She is 43 years old, married, and has two grown daughters. The elder of them is 23 years old, the younger is 21. Her children are studying the sewing of traditional clothing. Gulzira herself is a farmer. She plants vegetables on a plot near the house. Her daughters help her with this difficult work. Now is the time to put in winter crops, and Gulzira is getting ready for planting. She wants to plant potatoes, but first she needs to enrich the soil with mineral fertilizers. She doesn't have the money to buy the amount of fertilizer needed, so she is asking for a loan. She believes that she will have a good harvest, and her labors will not be without reward.

loans.use: To buy fertilizer

loans.name: Jebaud Lestari Group

texts.en: Having succeeded in the previous loan period, the Jebaud Lestari group proceeds to the next loan. Based on the assessment of MUK, the group received 16 million IDR for the group's loan, and individual persons got 2,000,000 IDR each. Because most group members have been able to increase the number of their pigs, the current loan is being used to buy food and fix the cages. In particular, Ni Kadek is using her share of the loan to buy a local sow and build a new cage. She has been very pleased with the effort can be developed. She hopes to become a big seller of pigs at her village, and to use all the profits to improve the welfare of her family and make her dream come true.

loans.use: to purchase a local sow and build a new cage

loans.name: Aurora Mercedes

texts.es:
En Mejía localizada a unos pocos kilómetros de la ciudad de Portoviejo ciudad de gente dedicada en gran parte a la agricultura, al cultivo y venta de cocos se reúnen cada quince días el Banco Comunal Mejía.
En este lugar vive la señora Aurora, tiene 56 años de edad, hace años su esposo falleció pero  de esa relación tuvo cinco hijos todos mayores de edad e independientes.
Doña Aurora  tiene una tienda de víveres, en la cual vende toda clase de productos como arroz, azúcar, aceites, detergentes, y también vende bebidas como agua, colas y cervezas, trabaja todos los días desde las 8h00 hasta las 19h00, los productos los compra en el centro de Portoviejo aunque la mayoría de sus productos los recibe en su local, lleva en su negocio 13 años y ella se hizo cargo  una vez que su esposo falleció. 
Este crédito lo va a emplear en surtir mas su tienda, va a comprar arroz, azúcar, aceite, detergentes, aguas, sodas, entre otros productos. Está en el Banco Comunal hace 7 años y le gusta por la ayuda que les brinda la institución. Sus metas son seguir adelante en su negocio y que su tienda crezca cada día más.
texts.en:
The Mejía Communal Bank meets every two weeks in Mejía, located a few kilometers from the city of Portoviejo, where most people are farmers.

Aurora lives here.  She is 56 years old and her husband passed away years ago, but they have five adult children on their own.

Aurora has a food store where she sells all sorts of products such as rice, sugar, cooking oils, detergents and also drinks such as water, colas, and beer.  She works every day from 8:00 am to 7:00 pm.  She buys her product in Portoviejo, but she gets most of them locally.  She has had her business for 13 years and took charge of it when her husband passed away. 

She will use the money from this loan to buy rice, sugar, cooking oil, detergents, water, sodas, and other products.  She has been with the communal bank for seven year and she likes the help that the institution gives.  Her goals are to continue ahead with her business and grow it every day.

loans.use: to stock her store.

loans.name: Dario

texts.en:
Dario is married and has seven children. Dario is 43 years old and lives in Barangay Minsubong, Tangub City.

To earn a living, Dario has a sari-sari (convenience) store. He has had this business for one year. Each month, he earns approximately PHP 5,000. Dario is a new member of PMPC. In the future, Dario hopes to improves his living conditions and to support the daily needs of his children.

loans.use: to purchase additional stock for his sari-sari store

loans.name: Soeurm

texts.en: Soeurm, a mother of nine children in mid 50s, is a villager from Sangke district of Battambang province. To cover the daily food consumption, she sells desserts and does rice farming as the main source of income. This business has returned her about 81,700 KHR per day. This is the first loan for Soeurm with VisionFund’s Kiva partner. She wants to fulfill her daughter’s dream in obtaining bachelor degree majoring in Agriculture. Hence, she will spend her entire loan portion to pay the tuition fee for her daughter. She hopes that her daughter can get a good job after graduate.

loans.use: To pay the tuition fee for her daughter

loans.name: Tongal

texts.en:
Tongal is 50 years old and the father of eight children. He has two hectares and half area of farmland for growing rice as the primary source of income. His family also earn additional income via a balloon selling business. Tongal is a first time borrower with VisionFund (Kiva’s partner). He is seeking this loan in order to support his son, who wants to continue his bachelor degree majoring in Management, by covering the school fee. He hopes that his son can get a good job, so as his son can help the family to attain a better lifestyle.



Noted : This is the picture of his family including his son and his wife

loans.use: to pay the school fee for her son

location.town: Svay Reang Province, Svay Chrom District

loans.name: Boris Alain

texts.es:
Boris Alain tiene 28 años de edad, vive en el distrito de Chulucanas sus principales actividades que realiza su población es el turismo, comercio y cultivos de frutales, ubicado en la Región , Piura, costa norte del Perú.

El se dedica al servicio de transporte en mototaxi, trasladando a sus pasajeros a las zonas aledañas a su comunidad, ha solicitado un préstamo de 1 000 nuevos soles para reparación de la motor de su vehículo y una segunda parte para compra de ropa para posteriormente comercializarlo.
texts.en:
Boris Alain, 28, lives with his family in the Chulucanas district in the Piura region on the northern coast of Peru.  The main jobs in his community are tourism, trade, and growing fruit.

Boris Alain makes a living providing motorcycle taxi service, taking his passengers to the areas near his community.

He has requested a loan for 1,000 nuevos soles [PEN] to repair the motor of his vehicle.  He'll use part of the money to buy clothing that he'll later sell.

loans.use: to repair the motor of his vehicle

loans.name: Carlos Alberto

texts.es:
Carlos Alberto tiene 25 años de edad, vive junto a su esposa y su hijo en Nueva Arica una zona rural, su población se dedica a la agricultura y comercio, a una hora de la ciudad de Chiclayo, costa norte del Perú.

Con el apoyo de su esposa se dedican a la crianza y comercialización de animales menores, gallinas, pavos , patos y cuyes, su negocio está ubicado en la parte posterior a su domicilio.

Ha solicitado un préstamo de 1 500 nuevos soles para comprar alimentos balanceados y construcción de corrales para los mismo y de esta manera tener una mejor producción para ofrecer a sus clientes, generándole ingresos adicionales para su familia.
texts.en:
Carlos Alberto, 25, lives with his wife and son in rural Nueva Arica, where the residents are farmers and merchants. It is one hour from the city of Chiclayo on Peru's north coast. He and his wife raise and sell small animals such as hens, turkeys, and guinea pigs. His business is in the back of his house.

He has applied for a loan of 1500 nuevos soles to buy nutritious animal feed and build two guinea pig pens so that he can increase his stock to sell and generate more income for his family.

loans.use: to buy nutritious animal feed and build two guinea pig pens.

loans.name: Maksatkan

texts.ru: Максаткан 35 лет, замужем, не смотря на свой молодой возраст у Максаткан 5 детей, которых она счастливо воспитывает вместе со своим супругом. У Максаткан - высшее образование, работает главным специалистом в сельской управе, несмотря на то, что у нее есть работа Максаткан дополнительно в качестве дохода для своей семьи занимается животноводством, так как на зарплату прожить трудно, тем более с 5 детьми. Супруг занимается часным извозом, предоставляет услуги перевозок пассажирам между селами. Животноводством Жылдызкан занялась 15 лет назад, с покупки скота на 5,000 сом KGS. Благодаря упорному труду Максаткан, в ее хозяйстве на сегодняшний день имеется: 4 дойные коровы, 5 лошадей. Ежемесячный доход составляет 6,000 сом (KGS). В целях дальнейшего развития своего хозяйства, Максаткан обратилась в Микрофинансовый банк «Бай –Тушум и Партнеры» за кредитом в сумме 30,000 сом (KGS) на покупку овец для увеличения поголовья скота. Доходы от кредита Максаткан планирует вложить в дальнейшее приумножение количества домашней скотины, и планирует накопить средства на покупку стиральной машины, так как детки все маленькие и приходится стирать каждый день.
texts.en:
Maksatkan is 35 years old and married.  In spite of her young age, she already has five children and she brings them up happily with her husband.   She has a higher education and works as a chief adviser for her village council.  In addition to her job, she is also involved in animal husbandry, an activity which provides an extra income for her family, as it would be difficult to live on her salary alone, especially with five children to support.  Maksatkan's husband works as a private driver, providing transportation services to people, from village to village.

Maksatkan has been involved in animal husbandry for 15 years.  She started in this business by buying livestock for 5,000 som (KGS).  Thanks to her hard work, she now owns four dairy cows and five horses.  She makes a monthly income of 6,000 som (KGS).

In order to further develop her farming business, Maksatkan has turned to the microfinance bank "Bai Tushum & Partners" for a loan of 30,000 som (KGS). She will use her loan to buy some sheep in order to increase her livestock headcount. She plans to re-invest the profits from this loan back into her business by purchasing additional livestock. She is also planning to save enough money to buy a washing machine, because her children are still young and she needs to wash clothes every day.

loans.use: to buy sheep.

loans.name: Santiago Noel

texts.es:
Santiago Noel es un joven de 32 años originario del municipio de El Sauce, estudió la carrera de Periodismo y hace cinco años inició su propio negocio el cual consiste en brindar servicio de Barbería a los pobladores en general. Este oficio lo aprendió en el negocio de su hermano mayor y por la falta de empleo en Nicaragua optó por instalar este negocio en su casa de habitación con ayuda de préstamos con el fin de generar sus propios ingresos y ayudar en los gastos a su madre.
Se siente muy agradecido con los inversionistas de Kiva y Ceprodel porque gracias a los préstamos que le han otorgado logró mejorar las condiciones del negocio donde hoy brinda un mejor servicio a sus clientes los cuales se sienten satisfechos.
En este momento tiene la necesidad de un financiamiento para la compra de una silla giratoria para la barbería para seguir brindando un mejor servicio a sus clientes.
Espera y confía en Dios que le apoyen con esta solicitud para llevar a cabo su inversión.
texts.en:
Santiago Noel is a young man of 32 years of age originally from the municipality of El Sauce. He studied journalism at university and five years ago he began his own business, which consists of offering barber’s services to the general population. He learnt how to do this in the business of his older brother. Due to the lack of employment in Nicaragua he decided to set up this business in his home with the help of loans and with the goal of generating his own income and helping his mother with expenses.

He feels very grateful to Kiva and CEPRODEL investors because thanks to the loans they have granted him, he managed to improve his business conditions and he now offers a better service to his clients and they feel satisfied.

He currently needs financing to purchase a swivel chair for his barber’s shop in order to continue offering better service to his clients.

He hopes and is trusting God that you will help him with this request so he can continue with his investment.

loans.use: to purchase a swivel chair for his barber's shop

loans.name: Mehriniso

texts.ru: Мехринисо разведенная женщина в возрасте 43 лет, проживает в городе Турсунзаде. У нее четверо детей, которых она обеспечивает сама. Мехринисо имеет средне-специальное медицинское образование и в течение 10 лет работает в аптеке. Одновременно Мехринисо является дистрибьютором в косметической компании Faberlic. Она покупает и перепродает косметику и косметические средства в течение 3 лет. Мехринисо сейчас нуждается в кредите. Она на сумму кредита собирается приобрести новый ассортимент косметики и косметических средств. Она усердно работает на двух работах, чтобы ее дети ни в чем не нуждались. Поддержите Мехринисо!
texts.en:
Mehriniso, age 43, is divorced and lives in the city of Tursunzoda.  She has four children, whom she supports on her own.  She has a specialized secondary education in the medical field, and she has been working in a pharmacy for ten years.  At the same time, she works as a distributor for the company "Faberlic".  She has been buying and selling cosmetics and beauty products for the past three years.

Mehriniso currently needs a loan to purchase a new inventory of cosmetics and beauty products.  She has two jobs and works very hard at both, so that her children will not lack anything. Please support her!

loans.use: to buy a variety of cosmetics and beauty products.

loans.name: Julia Maribel

texts.es:
La Señora. Julia es una socia que ya forma del grupo de crédito Yanbal desde hace un año, en todo este tiempo ha establecido una mejor amistad con todas sus compañeras, sale de su rutina diaria de trabajo gracias al compañerismo que existe en el grupo. Vive por el centro de la ciudad de Cuenca, esta ciudad esta bañada por 4 ríos, su centro histórico guarda celosamente su historia, esta ciudad tiene una amplia gastronomía y es cuna de grandes poetas y deportistas. 
La Señora. Julia tiene 38 años de edad, es casada y fruto de esa unión ha concebido 3 hijos  de 21, 15 y 3 años de edad, su primer hijo está estudiando en la universidad y su segundo hijo estudia en el colegio, su esposo es de profesión Policía, no tiene casa propia por lo que vive arrendando.
Doña Julia desde hace algún tiempo labora como asistente de colecturía en un colegio de la ciudad, labora de lunes a viernes todo el día. 
El dinero de su crédito va a ser invertido en los estudios de sus hijos, va a comprar útiles escolares y libros. Su sueño es tener su casa propia.
texts.en:
Julia has been a member of the Yanbal group for a year, and has established good friendships with her fellow members.  She breaks her work routine each day thanks to the camaraderie of this group.  She lives in the center of the city of Cuenca, a city bathed by four rivers. Its historic center jealously holds onto its history and this city has diverse foods and is the cradle of grand poets and athletes.

Julia is 38 years old, married, and has three children, ages, 21, 15, and 3.  Her oldest son attends university and the next oldest attends high school.  Her husband is a police officer and they live in a rented home.

Julia has been working as an assistant in a collection office at a school in town.  She works all day Monday through Friday.

She will use the money from this loan to pay for her children’s studies.  She will buy school supplies and books.  Her dream is to own a home.

loans.use: to buy school supplies and books.

loans.name: Teresa

texts.es:
Teresa tiene 62 años de edad, vive junto a su esposo a Sorronto Bajo una zona rural de Oyotun, su población se dedica al cultivo de algodón a dos horas de la ciudad de Chiclayo, costa norte del Perú.

Tiene una bodega donde ofrece abarrotes, cerveza y marcianos, su negocio se encuentra en su mismo domicilio, ha solicitado un préstamo de 1 500 nuevos soles para la compra de abarrotes en general y de esta manera hacer crecer su negocio generando ingresos adicionales para su familia.
texts.en:
Teresa is 62 years old, lives together with her husband in Sorronto Bajo, a rural zone in Oyotun. Her town, two hours from the city of Chiclayo, on the northern coast of Peru, is dedicated to the cultivation of cotton.

She has a small grocery store which has groceries, beer, and frozen popsicles.  Her business is located in her very house.  She has requested a loan of 1500 nuevos soles to buy the groceries in order to expand her business to generate additional income for her family.

loans.use: to buy groceries to stock her small store.

loans.name: Maria Esperanza

texts.es:
María Esperanza tiene 46 años de edad, vive junto a su esposo y sus dos hijos en el distrito de Nueva Arica, en una zona rural, su población se dedica a la cultivo de manzanas, maíz, comercio de animales menores y transporte, a dos horas de la ciudad de Chiclayo.

Ella se dedica a la crianza y venta de aves de corral, su negocio está ubicado en la parte posterior a su domicilio, con los ingresos apoya a su esposo con los gastos familiares.

Ha solicitado un préstamo de 2 500 nuevos soles para construir corrales para una granja de cerdos y así tener una mejor producción para ofrecer a sus clientes, generándole mayores ingresos para su familia.
texts.en:
María Esperanza is 46 years old. She lives with her husband and her two children in the district of Nueva Arica, in a rural area. Its population makes a living by growing apples and corn, selling young animals, and providing transportation. It is located two hours away from the city of Chiclayo.

María Esperanza makes a living by raising and selling poultry. Her business is located at the back of her home. She uses her earnings to help her husband with the family expenses.

She has requested a loan of 2,500 PEN in order to construct pens for a pig farm, thereby having more to offer her clients and generating greater earnings for her family.

loans.use: to build pens for a pig farm

loans.name: Ines Sonia

texts.es: Sonia nació en la ciudad de Sicuani  pero vive en la ciudad de Salvación. (La ciudad de Salvación está ubicada en el distrito del Manu en la provincia de Manu dentro del departamento de Madre de Dios, Perú), ella tiene 37 años de edad y tiene una relación de unión libre de la cual tiene cuatro hijos, ella es una madre trabajadora y emprendedora que saca adelante su familia y su actividad económica principal es la venta de productos de primera necesidad como arroz, azúcar, fideos, aceite, leche y otras cosas más, ella tiene un pequeña tienda de abarrotes implementada con la necesidades básicas.  Ya son varios años que se dedica al negocio y ve la muy bien gracias al empeño que pone en su trabajo. Ella pertenece al banco comunal “Tesoritos del Manu” y en esta oportunidad requiere el préstamo para comprar más mercadería como por ejemplo sacos de arroz y sacos de azúcar en grandes cantidades pues le conviene porque el costo es más barato. Agradece y valora el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con el pago de sus cuotas mensuales.
texts.en:
Sonia was born in the city of Sicuani but now she lives in Salvación, which is located in Manu district, Manu province, Madre de Dios department. She is 37 years old, in a civil union, and has four children. She is a hard-working and enterprising mother who moves her family forward. Her primary economic activity involves selling basic necessity products such as rice, sugar, noodles, cooking oil, milk, and more. She has a small grocery store full of these products. She has worked in this business for several years and it is going well thanks to her efforts.

Sonia belongs to the "Tesoritos del Manu" communal bank and is now requesting a loan to buy more merchandise such as sacks of rice and sugar in large quantities so it will cost less. She values and is grateful for the loan and promises to make her monthly payments.

loans.use: to buy more merchandise such as sacks of rice and sugar.

location.town: Salvacion - Manu - Manu - Madre de Dios

loans.name: Sergio

texts.es:
Sergio tiene 23 años de edad, vive junto a sus padres en el distrito de Zaña, su población se dedica a la elaboración y comercialización de dulces, agricultura y ganadería, a una hora con cuarenta y cinco minutos de la ciudad de Chiclayo, costa norte del Perú.

El brinda el servicio de play station, tipeos e impresiones, desde hace más de 2 años, su negocio está ubicado en su domicilio, el nos explica que se dedica a esta actividad para apoyar a sus padres.

Ha solicitado un préstamo de 1 000 nuevos soles para comprar útiles escolares, haciendo crecer su negocio y arreglo de su impresora para seguir brindando el servicio de impresiones.
texts.en: Sergio, 23, lives with his parents in the Zaña district, where the residents make candies, farm, and raise livestock. It is an hour and forty-five minutes from the city of Chiclayo on Peru's north coast. Sergio has been offering Play Station, typing, and printing service from his house for the past two years. He says he runs this business to support his parents. He has applied for a loan of 1000 nuevos soles to buy school supplies to grow his business and to repair his printer and keep offering that service.

loans.use: to buy school supplies to stock his business.

loans.name: Collene

texts.en:
West Indies native Collene was born in Grenada and moved to the United States in 1976. 

In 2009, armed with a design-related degree and a passion for interior design and home staging, Collene started Exclusive Creations Design. This interior design business services individuals and families who want to improve their residential spaces and want to make their home not just a living space but also a sanctuary. 

Collene has been steadily building her client base and she envisions a big future for Exclusive Creations Design. She wants to expand her business into the business-to-business market, particularly with investors and property management companies and hire employees. Above all else, Collene wants to “show through example to my son that my passion can be channeled into a successful business.”

Help Collene fulfill these aspirations by contributing to her loan goal. With you contribution, Collene will be able to enhance her marketing efforts and purchase additional furniture for the model homes she uses to showcase her expertise.

Visit her website here:  Exclusivecreationsdesign.com

loans.use: to purchase additional furniture for model homes.

loans.name: Mary Ann

texts.en:
Mary Ann is married with two children. Mary Ann is 24 years old and lives in Liloy-Caracol, Salug, Zamboanga del Norte. Mary Ann sells ready-to-wear's to earn a living and has had this business for seven months. Each month, she earns 6,000 PHP doing this type of business. She has requested a loan for 20,000 PHP to purchase more stocks to resell.

Mary Ann is new member of PMPC as of this year (2013). In the future, Mary Ann hopes to improve her business.

loans.use: to purchase more stocks to resell.

location.town: Liloy- Caracol, Salug, Zamboanga del Norte

loans.name: Apromiano

texts.es:
Apromiano tiene 58 años de edad vive junto a su esposa y sus hijos, en el distrito de Lagunas, su población se dedica al cultivo de caña, comercio y ganadería a una hora con cuarenta y cinco minutos de la ciudad de Chiclayo, costa norte del Perú.

El se dedica a la venta de aguardiente por la zonas aledañas a su distrito, nos explica que se dedica a esta actividad desde hace 3 años y ha solicitado un préstamo de 1 000 nuevos soles para la compra de equipos artesanales para la destilación del mismo, con lo que tendrá mayor producción para ofrecer a sus clientes y así mismo generándole ingresos adicionales para su familia.
texts.en:
Apromiano is 58 years old and lives with his wife and children in the district of Lagunas.  The people there work planting cane, in commerce, and raising livestock.  It is located an hour and forty five minutes from the city of Chiclayo on the northern coast of Peru.

He works selling liquor in the areas around his district.  He explains that he has done this work for three years.  He is now requesting a loan of 1,000 nuevos soles to purchase equipment to distill himself.  With this, he will have more production to offer his customers so that he can generate additional income for his family.

loans.use: to purchase equipment to distill liquor.

loans.name: Oswaldo

texts.es:
Oswaldo tiene 42 años de edad, vive junto a su esposa e hijos en el distrito de Pucará, la fuente principal económica de su población es la agricultura, cultivo de frutales, cacao y arroz y el comercio de los mismos, a dos horas de la ciudad de Jaén, que se encuentra ubicado en la Región Cajamarca, costa norte del Perú.

El se dedica al comercio de productos de granos, menestras, maíz, trigo, arroz, etc, los productos los compra en los caseríos cercanos de Pucará para luego venderlos en el mismo distrito.

Ha solicitado un préstamo de 2 000 nuevos soles para comprar más productos y de esta manera hacer crecer su negocio, generándole mayores ingresos paras su familia.
texts.en:
Oswaldo, 42, lives with his wife and children in the Pucará district, two hours from the city of Jaén in the Cajamarca region on the northern coast of Peru.  The main source of income of the people there is agriculture, growing and selling fruit trees, cacao, and rice.

He makes a living selling grains, beans, corn, wheat, rice, etc.  He buys the products in the communities near Pucará and sells them in the same area.

Oswaldo has requested a loan for 2,000 nuevos soles [PEN] to buy more products so he can increase his business and earn more income for his family.

loans.use: to buy products to stock his business

loans.name: Juan Eduardo

texts.es:
Juan Eduardo tiene 30 años de edad, vive en el distrito de La Matanza, una comunidad que se dedica a la agricultura, comercio y ganadería, a dos horas de la ciudad de Piura, costa norte del Perú.

El brinda el servicio de transporte en su mototaxi, trasladando a sus pasajeros a los caseríos aledaños a su comunidad, adicionalmente recibe ingresos por labores en la empresa de frutales de la zona.

Ha solicitado un préstamo de 1 500 nuevos soles para darle mantenimiento a su vehículo y de esta manera seguir brindado un servicio seguro a sus clientes y seguir generando ingresos para una mejor calidad de vida.
texts.en: Juan Eduardo, 30, lives in the La Matanza district, where the residents are farmers, merchants, and cattle ranchers. It is located two hours from the city of Piura on Peru's north coast. Juan offers taxi service to homes around the community. He also earns money working for a local fruit business. He has applied for a loan of 1500 nuevos soles to maintain his vehicle so that he can offer his customers safe transport and keep earning income to improve his standard of living.

loans.use: to maintain his vehicle.

loans.name: Virgen De Fatima Group

texts.es:
El grupo llamado Virgen de Fatima, las mismas son reconocidas en el lugar como mujeres muy trabajadoras que se esfuerzan por poder salir adelante y crecer. Ellas se fijaron como meta el crecer no solo en lo económico, sino también como personas.
Gabriela es parte de este grupo, y comenta que se dedica a ser manicurista, y que por medio de su esfuerzo y su lucha esta dando a su familia todo lo que puede de acuerdo a sus posibilidades.
Pide este crédito la Sra. Gabriela para poder comprar esmaltes, acetonas, algodón, alicates y demás insumos para poder seguir haciendo sus servicios y seguir luchando por mejorar sus ingresos.
texts.en:
This group is called "Virgen de Fatima," and the members themselves are recognized in the area as very hardworking women who strive to get ahead and grow. They have established a goal to not only grow financially, but also personally. 
Gabriela is a member of this group. She says that she works as a manicurist, and that through her strenuous effort, she is providing her family with all that she can in accordance with her means. 
Gabriela is applying for this loan to be able buy nail polish, nail polish remover, cotton, cuticle cutters, and other supplies in order to continue offering her services and striving to increase her income.

loans.use: to buy nail polish, nail polish remover, cotton, cuticle clippers, and other supplies.

loans.name: Ivan

texts.es:
Iván y su esposa son profesores en el área rural, actualmente viven en la casa de sus padres, en donde tienen una habitación con piso de tierra. Tienen una casita  propia que Ivan está refaccionando. Tienen dos hijos, un bebe y un niño que esta en etapa escolar y viven en la población de Achacachi a una hora y  media de viaje  de la ciudad de La Paz.

El crédito es para comprar materiales como arena, cemento, estuco para refaccionar su casa y vivir más comodamente.

El sueño de Iván es contar con un domicilio en condiciones de buena habitabilidad para confort de su familia.

Es la primera  vez que solicita crédito  en IMPRO y la primera vez con KIVA.
texts.en:
Iván and his wife are teachers in a rural area. They currently live in his parents' house where they have a room with a dirt floor. They have a small home that Iván is repairing. They also have two children: a baby and a son who is in school. They live in Achacachi, which is an hour and a half away from the city of La Paz.

This loan will be used to buy materials such as sand, cement, and stucco to repair his home and live more comfortably. This is the first loan he is requesting from IMPRO and his first loan with Kiva.

Iván's dream is to have a home in livable conditions for his family's comfort.

loans.use: to buy cement, sand, and stucco, to repair his home and live more comfortably.

loans.name: Tony

texts.en:
In 2010, Tony saw an opportunity to offer people superior face-to-face service when having taxes prepared versus getting their taxes done online. He wanted to provide clients with a personal and professional service that would leave them feeling completely confident that their taxes had been prepared properly.  That’s when Tony started Topflight Taxes.

Topflight Taxes is a seasonal business that operates mostly during tax season, January through April. When it’s not tax season, Tony prepares bookkeeping, assists with opening businesses, and offers general consulting services for small businesses. 

With this loan, this young and ambitious entrepreneur will purchase some new equipment, including a computer, which he will rely on heavily during the upcoming tax season.

Help Tony buy his computer.

loans.use: to buy a computer.

loans.name: Jose

texts.en:
Nicaragua native Jose has lived in the United States for almost 30 years. Jose always knew that he wanted to be independent and when he recognized that entrepreneurship was the way to accomplish that goal, he took his time educating himself and equipping himself with the knowledge required to run a business.

He earned a degree in Business Administration at a university in Florida, and in 2004, Jose opened Right Choice Miami, a fresh produce distribution company. Being the head and the face of his business, Jose has committed himself entirely to making it successful. He gets up early in the morning and personally picks the fresh produce that he will distribute to his clients.

His hard work has paid off: He nabbed a one-year contract with a local hotel servicing company and he has a host of local restaurants that have remained loyal clients since Right Choice of Miami’s opening nine years ago.

Now this hardworking and determined entrepreneur needs your help. With this loan, Jose will purchase a new refrigerator for his van that he will use to keep his produce fresh while transporting them to clients.

Help Jose keep his produce fresh and contribute to his loan goal today.

loans.use: to purchase a new refrigerator for his van.

loans.name: Maria Eugenia

texts.es:
María Eugenia tiene 57 años de edad, vive junto a su esposo en el distrito de Nueva Arica, una zona rural, su población se dedica al comercio, agricultura y comercio a dos horas de la ciudad de Chiclayo, costa norte del Perú.

Ella se dedica a la crianza de aves de corral, en su mismo domicilio para apoyar a su esposo con los gastos familiares, su esposo se dedica a al docencia en un colegio de la zona.

María ha solicitado un préstamo de 2 500 nuevos soles para la compra de alimentos balanceados y una segunda parte para la construcción de una granja de cerdos.
texts.en:
María Eugenia is 57 years old and lives with her husband in the Nueva Arica district, a rural area. Its population is engaged in commerce, agriculture and trade two hours from the city of Chiclayo, on the northern coast of Peru.

She makes her living by raising poultry in her home to help her husband with the family expenses. Her husband makes his living as a teacher in a school in the area.

Maria has requested a loan of 2500 nuevos soles for the purchase of balanced feed and a second part for the construction of a pig farm.

loans.use: to purchase balanced feed and construction for a pig farm

loans.name: Maria Amparo

texts.es:
María Amparo tiene 26 años de edad, vive junto as u esposo en el distrito de Oyotun una zona rural donde su población se dedica a la agricultura, comercio, y ganadería a dos horas de la ciudad de Chiclayo, costa norte del Perú.

Ella se dedica a la crianza y venta de aves de corral, su negocio está ubicado en la parte posterior a su domicilio, ha solicitado un préstamo de 1 000 nuevos soles para la compra de alimentos balanceados y así tener una mejor producción para ofrecer a sus clientes, generándole mayores ingresos para su familia.
texts.en:
María Amparo, 26, lives with her spouse in the Oyotun district, a rural area where the people work as farmers, vendors, and ranchers. It is two hours from the city of Chiclayo, on the northern coast of Peru.

She works by raising and selling chickens. Her business is located in the back of her home. She is requesting a loan of 1,000 PEN to buy nutritious food. This will result in better production that she can offer her customers, which will provide her with more income for her family.

loans.use: to buy nutritious food.

loans.name: Norma Milagros

texts.es:
La Señora. Norma forma parte del grupo de crédito El Arenal, le gusta esta forma de créditos por la solidaridad y unión del grupo, al mismo tiempo que los  créditos le benefician en su pequeño negocio. Vive por la parroquia de Baños en Cuenca, de su volcán emana agua termal por lo que es propicia para disfrutar de las piscinas, existen varios lugares para disfrutar y su gastronomía es variada.
La Señora. Norma tiene 32 años de edad, vive en unión libre y ha concebido 3 hijos de 16, 14, 2 años de edad, sus dos primeros hijos están estudiando en el colegio, su esposo labora como albañil, no tienen casa propia por lo que viven en casa de un familiar.
Doña Norma se dedica a los quehaceres de su casa pero para ayudarle a su esposo con los gastos del hogar se dedica a la crianza de pollos y también limpia casas.
El dinero de su crédito va a invertir en la compra de pollo y alimento para los mismos. Su meta es tener un galpón de pollos más grande.
texts.en:
Norma is part of the credit group El Arenal.  She likes this type of loan because of the solidarity and togetherness of the group, and at the same time, the loans benefit her small business.  She lives in the parish of Baños in Cuenca, where the volcano emits thermal water, which makes the pools very enjoyable.  There are a variety of places to enjoy and its cuisine is varied.  

Norma is 32 years old, married, and has three children who are 2, 14, and 16 years old.  Her two older children are studying in high school.  Her husband works in construction.  They do not have their own house, so they live in a relative's home.  Norma works taking care of the household and helps her husband with the household expenses by raising chickens and cleaning houses.

She will use this loan to invest in the purchase of chickens and feed for them.  Her goal is to have a larger chicken coop.

loans.use: to purchase chickens and feed for them.

loans.name: María Belen

texts.es:
La Señora María forma parte del grupo de crédito El Arenal, en este grupo se encuentra muy a gusto ya que todas sus integrantes forman una familia, a mas que los créditos le permiten invertir en su negocio. Vive por el hermoso sector de San Joaquín en Cuenca, lugar que es reconocido por sus carnes asadas, también sus tierras son muy fértiles donde se cosechas una gran variedad de hortalizas.
La Señora. María tiene 25 años de edad, es viuda y en su vida conyugal ha concebido una hija de 9 años de edad, no tiene casa propia por lo que vive en casa de sus padres con quienes comparte los gastos del hogar.
Doña María es una mujer emprendedora que se dedica a la venta de ropa por catalogo desde hace 3 años, hace poco también esta laborando como empleada privada y se encuentra estudiando en la universidad la carrera de Derecho.
El dinero de su crédito va a invertir en la compra de  ropa para ofrecer a su clientela la cual ha ido obteniendo poco a poco.
texts.en:
María is part of the group “El Arenal”. She likes this group a lot since all the members are like family and the loans allow her to invest in her business. She lives in the beautiful area of San Joaquín, Cuenca. It is known for its roast meats and fertile land, from which a great variety of vegetables are harvested. 

María is 25 years old. She is a widow and from her marriage she conceived a daughter, who is now nine years of age. She does not have her own house so she lives in her parents’ house and shares the household expenses.

María is an enterprising woman who has made a living by selling clothes via catalogue for three years. She has also been working as an employee for a little while and she is studying towards a law degree at university.

She is going to invest the money from her loan in purchasing clothes to offer to her clientele, which she has been building up over time.

loans.use: to purchase clothing

loans.name: Emiliano

texts.es: El señor Emiliano tiene 51 años, vive en el Sindicato 24 de Noviembre de la provincia Carrasco, antes vivía en Potosí pero tuvo que cambiar de residencia porque allá no tenía ingresos suficientes, junto a sus hijos tomaron un nuevo rumbo y ahora trabaja como agricultor en su lote agrícola produciendo cítricos  en el Sindicato 24 de Noviembre donde también trabaja como jornalero. El crédito  que solicita es para plantación de piña para incrementar sus ingresos y darle un mejor nivel de vida a su familia.
texts.en: Señor Emiliano is 51-years old.  He lives in Sindicato 24 de Noviembre in Carrasco Provence.  He formerly lived in Potosí but had to move because he wasn't earning enough there.  He and his children started on a new path, and now señor Emiliano works as a farmer growing citrus on his plot of farmland in Sindicato 24 de Noviembre.  He also works there as a day laborer.  The loan señor Emiliano is requesting is for planting pineapple so he can increase his income and give his family a better quality of life.

loans.use: with planting pineapple.

loans.name: Pablo Javier

texts.es: El señor Pablo tiene 22 años, es de la ciudad de Tarija, desde temprana edad se dedicó a trabajar como ayudante de sonido y poco después se convirtió en Dj. Percibe un ingreso mensual con el cual ayuda a su mamá en los gastos de su casa, ahora está solicitando un crédito para refaccionar el techo de su vivienda ya que se vienen épocas de lluvia y se teme que la situación empeore.
texts.en: Mr. Pablo is 22 years old. He is from the city of Tarija. From an early age he made a living by working as a sound assistant and soon after became a DJ. He earns a monthly income which helps his mother with household expenses. He is now requesting a loan to repair the roof of his house since the rainy season is coming and he is worried that the situation will get worse.

loans.use: to repair the roof of his house

loans.name: Jerome

texts.en:
Jerome was a fitness instructor for many years at a large, well-known gym. He and his wife Arlene realized that people were purchasing memberships to that gym just to take a Zumba Fitness Class with Jerome.

That’s when the idea for Studio Jear was born. This husband and wife team wanted to open a fitness studio with no membership fees, no contracts, and no fine print to satisfy the need Arlene and Jerome saw for affordable fitness. 

“Our belief is that fitness is working out the mind and body as well as the soul. Hence our tagline: MORE than just a workout.”

Studio Jear opened its doors in the spring of 2010 and its effective fitness classes and low cost have led to tons of word-of-mouth referrals. Arlene and Jerome are thrilled when new Studio Jear-goers report that their friend or co-worker told them about the “awesome classes with no membership.”

Arlene and Jerome need your help to take Studio Jear to the next level. They’d like to use this loan to market the business and expand community awareness of the fitness studio and purchase a few more pieces of equipment that will allow them to accommodate more people during class.

Help Arlene and Jear market their fitness studio and purchase new equipment. Check out their business’s website here: zumbajear.com

loans.use: to purchase more fitness equipment.

loans.name: Sylvester

texts.en:
Sylvester’s family has worked in salon services for over 20 years, and Sylvester himself is a licensed cosmetologist.

When his father passed away, Sylvester’s mother asked him to join the family business. Since then, Sylvester has been working hard to grow Sunrise, Florida’s Dolled Up Salons, maintaining the high-quality service while expanding the client base. In an effort to make Dolled up Salons reach its full potential, Sylvester has even updated the salon’s marketing campaigns and enhanced its online presence.

“I have had the opportunity to take hold of my financial destiny and create my own rule book,” Sylvester says. “I’ve also learned about business and excellent customer service.”

Now, this family-oriented entrepreneur needs your help. He will use this loan to strengthen his online marketing efforts by marketing through search engines Google, Bing, and Yahoo and social network Yelp.

Help Sylvester strengthen his marketing efforts and support his wife and children.

Check out his business at adutalent.com

loans.use: to pay for marketing through search engines Google, Bing, and Yahoo and social network Yelp.

loans.name: Kyzygul

texts.ru: Кызыгул 66 лет, замужем, вместе с супругом воспитывают 4 детей. У Кызыгул - среднее образование, в качестве основного дохода для своей семьи Кызыгул занимается животноводством, стартовав 32 года назад, с покупки скота на 1,000 сом KGS. Благодаря упорному труду Кызыгул, в ее хозяйстве на сегодняшний день имеется: 4 дойные коровы, 15 коз. Ежемесячный доход составляет 9,000 сом (KGS). В целях дальнейшего развития своего хозяйства, Кызыгул обратилась в Микрофинансовый банк «Бай –Тушум и Партнеры» за кредитом в сумме 135,000 сом (KGS) на покупку телят для увеличения поголовья скота. Доходы от кредита Кызыгул планирует вложить в дальнейшее приумножение количества домашней скотины, и планирует накопить средства на строительство нового дома.
texts.en:
Kyzygul is 66 years old and married.  She and her husband have four children.  She has a secondary education and is involved in animal husbandry, an activity which provides the main source of income for her family.  She started in this business 32 years ago with the purchase of livestock for 1,000 som (KGS).  Thanks to her very hard work, she now has four dairy cows and 15 goats.  She makes a monthly income of 9,000 som (KGS).

In order to further develop her business, she has turned to the microfinance bank "Bai Tushum & Partners" for a loan of 135,000 som (KGS).  She will use her loan to buy calves, in order to increase her livestock headcount.  She plans to re-invest the profits from this loan back into her business by purchasing additional livestock.  She is also planning to save enough money for the construction of a new house.

loans.use: to buy calves.

loans.name: Alma May

texts.en:
Alma May is 23 years old and married with one child. She is a very hardworking entrepreneur.

Alma May has a fish vending business in the Philippines. She requested a PHP 6,000 loan amount through NWTF to purchase additional boxes of fish to sell.

Alma May has been in this business for six years. She would like to save enough to provide a secure future for her family.

loans.use: to purchase additional boxes of fish to sell

loans.name: Magdalena

texts.es:
Magdalena se dedica a a la venta de libros en la facultad de ingenieria en un puesto pequeño y una vez al mes asiste a las ferias de la alcaldia.

Ella vive en casa propia , ubicada en El Alto en la Villa Tejada Triangular del Departamento de La Paz a media  hora de distancia  de la ciudad de La Paz.

El préstamo para Magdalena será utilizado para  comprar libros de temporada (por fin de año) ya que en estas fechas son mas economicas comprarlas por cantidad. Asi poner a la venta variedad de libros para el publico.

Es la primera vez que solicita crédito junto a IMPRO y la primera vez con KIVA.
texts.en:
Magdalena sells books in a little stand at the engineering school, and once a month she sells them at the city fair.

She lives in her own house, located in El Alto in the Villa Tejada Triangular, in the department of La Paz, half an hour from the city of La Paz.

Magdalena's loan will be used to buy seasonal books (for the end of the year), since at this time of year they are more economical to buy in quantity, and thus she can put a variety of books on sale for the public.

This is the first time that she has applied for a loan from IMPRO and the first time from Kiva.

loans.use: to buy engineering books and other types of books to sell at her stand and at the city fair

loans.name: Dilmurod

texts.ru: Дилмуроду из Турсунзаде 40 лет. Он муж и отец. Для Дилмурода его город значит многое. Он здесь родился, вырос и здесь он живет со своей семьей. У него имеется маленький магазинчик, где продает продукты питания в частности печение, напитки, конфеты, подсолнечное масло и другое. Весь его доход уходит на обеспечение своей семьи. На данный момент Дилмуроду срочно нужно привести товар и пополнить свои запасы, потому что полки для товаров совсем опустошались. К сожалению, у Дилмурода не хватает денег для закупки продуктов, поэтому он просит Вас помочь. Дилмурод надеется на Вашу отзывчивость!
texts.en: Dilmurod, age 40, is from Tursunzoda.  He is a husband and father.  He loves his city.  This is the place where he was born, raised, and where he now lives with his family.  He has a small shop in which he sells food products such as biscuits, drinks, candy, sunflower oil etc.  He uses all his income to support his family.  At the moment, he urgently needs to bring in more merchandise and replenish his stocks, because his shelves are completely empty.  Unfortunately, he doesn't have enough money to buy food products, so he's asking for your help.  He relies on your readiness to help!

loans.use: to purchase food products for resale.

loans.name: Jennifer

texts.en:
Jennifer has always been passionate about well-being and emotional health. She started Enliven Wellness Works in 2009 when she recognized there were no businesses in the area that offered services of wellness in the workforce.

Through Enliven Wellness Works, Jennifer offers anti-stretch and coaching services to companies. In addition, this wife and mother of two conducts group fitness classes, massage services, wellness consulting, and data reporting for employers who want to improve the quality of their work environment. 

“My greatest success has been providing wellness programs for our school board accounts. It makes me very happy to help our school teachers be healthier and improve how they manage stress.”

Jennifer envisions a big future for Enliven Wellness Works. She wants to expand her reach and provide wellness education and services to more business. She believes that with every class she teaches, she has the opportunity to improve the lives of the program’s participants.

Help this generous entrepreneur meet her loan goal. Jennifer will use the loan to employ more staff and offer a wider range of services.

Check out her business’s website:  http://Enlivenwellnessworks.com

loans.use: to hire additional staff members.

loans.name: Robin

texts.en:
After researching the car service industry and realizing its potential, Robin, an entrepreneurial makeup artist, decided to take a risk and start her own car service company.

In 2011, Robin became the owner of Robin Lynn Artistry, a luxury car service base providing car and limo services throughout Manhattan and Queens. For Robin, the risk has definitely been worth the reward. Business has been growing steadily and Robin is excited about what Robin Lynn Artistry can blossom into.

This engaged mother currently has six drivers and five vehicles, but she aspires to eventually have 15 cars and over 25 employees servicing the greater New York area with luxury transportation.

Before she gets there, Robin needs your help. She will use this loan to build a website and begin to hire new drivers, which will allow her to extend the hours of her services.

Help Robin reach her loan goal of hiring new employees and building a website for her business.

loans.use: to hire new employees and build a website.

loans.name: Peggy

texts.en:
Peggy is 38 years old and lives in Tangub-Brgy.7, Misamis Occidental. She is married with five children. Peggy supports her husband who has a motor for hire business and earns approximately 6,000 PHP each month doing this type of work. Peggy has requested a loan to buy an additional second-hand motorcycle for hire.

Peggy has been a member of PMPC for one year and nine months. In the future, Peggy and her husband hope to improve their living conditions, provide for their daily needs and the daily needs of their children.

loans.use: to buy a second-hand motorcycle for hire.
