Trabaja de albañil de lunes a sábado, actualmente con mucho esfuerzo está construyendo su casa pero los gastos de las construcciones se han elevado, por ello solicita un crédito para comprar material y terminar la construcción de un cuarto que le falta, así podrá ofrecerle mayor comodidad a su familia y mejores condiciones  de vida.
texts.en: Ronald is married and has two children, ages 8 and 7.  He lives in the area known as "Zona de Plan 3000" which is a bit hard to get to.  He works as a bricklayer from Monday through Saturday and is currently building his own house.  As construction costs are going up, he is requesting a loan to buy material to finish one of the rooms he needs.  He wants his family to be more comfortable and have better living conditions.

loans.use: To buy construction material to finish a room.

loans.name: Huch's Group

texts.en:
Huch, originally from Pursat province, is 31 years old and blessed with three children, who are in school. She strives for her living via rice farming, the core income generating activity. To help her in earning additional income, her husband works a chef at wedding ceremonies. 

Huch has had her business for 10 years. This is the second microloan for Huch with VisionFund (Kiva’s partner). The positive impact of her last loan has enabled her to improve her living more than before and she managed to pay back that loan completely. 

Now, in a group of two, Huch is the leader. She and her co-borrower are seeking the same loan amount of 1,000,000 KHR each. For Huch, she will spend her loan portion to buy potash, pay for reaping fee, and buy pigs to raise for extra income. Additionally, she will spend some of the loan portion to renovate her house. Huch hopes that she can gain more income for her family so that she can keep her kids in school until tertiary level.

loans.use: To buy potash, pay for reaping fee, and buy pigs

loans.name: Ytamar

texts.es:
Ytamar tiene 50 años de edad, vive junto a su esposo y su hijo en el distrito de Oyotún, su población se dedica al cultivo de caña de azúcar en una zona rural.

Cliente se dedica a la venta de abarrotes arroz, fideos, cereales, leche, azúcar entre otros y cosméticos, con más de 10 años de experiencia en el negocio, su negocio está ubicado en su mismo domicilio.

Ha solicitado un préstamo de 2 000 nuevos soles para taner mayor stock de productos para poder atender las diversas necesidades, requerimientos y gustos de los clientes de la zona.
texts.en:
Ytamar, 50, lives with her husband and son in the district of Oyotún.  The local people grow sugar cane in this rural area.

The borrower sells groceries such as rice, noodles, cereals, milk, sugar, etc. and cosmetics.  She has been in business for over ten years and runs the store out of her home.

She is requesting a loan in the amount of 2,000 PEN to have a greater stock of products on hand to attend to the different needs, requests and preferences of the customers in the area.

loans.use: To buy groceries for her store.

loans.name: Coumba

texts.fr: Madame Coumba est une femme âgée de 60ans qui est mariée et mère de famille. Elle évolue dans le commerce depuis plus de 15ans. Elle sollicite ce prêt d'un montant de 400.000F pour acheter des arachides, niébé, huile de palme qu'elle revend à ses clients au marché. Elle n'a pas de charges particulières car elle a de grands enfants qui l'aident dans la gestion des dépenses quotidiennes de la maison. Coumba commence sa journée à 8h pour la terminer à 18h du soir. A l'avenir elle souhaite remplir d'avantages son magasin et diversifier ses produites afin de pouvoir augmenter ses revenus.
texts.en: Coumba is a 60-year-old woman who is married and a mother. She has been a retailer for over 15 years. She is requesting this 400 000 franc loan to buy groundnuts, cowpeas and palm oil to resell to her customers at the market. She has no specific expenses because her adult children support her with the daily household expenditures. Coumba starts her workday at 8 o'clock and finishes at 6 in the evening. In the future, she would like to increase her inventory and diversify her product range in order to increase her income.

loans.use: to buy groundnuts, cowpeas and palm oil for resale.

loans.name: Alioune Badara

texts.fr:
Alioune Badara est un enseignant qui exerce le métier depuis 20 ans maintenant. Il est marié et père de cinq enfants dont l’ainé a 16 ans et le cadet, 2 ans. Il vit en famille avec sa femme et ses enfants et ses parents, ce qui allège ses charges car il à quatre frères dans la maison, il participe donc pour la dépense quotidienne.
Alioune Badara fait parti des anciens clients du guichet et a eu à bénéficier de sept crédits payés convenablement. Il possède une pirogue qu’il veut réfectionner, c’est l’objectif du crédit qu’elle sollicite à l’IMCEC. Avec les bénéfices de son activité de peche, Alioune Badara a pu améliorer les conditions alimentaires de la famille. Il souhaite un jour, terminer la construction de sa maison, augmenter la taille de sa pirogue et l’équiper d’un moteur. Cela créera aussi des emplois au niveau du village, ainsi Alioune Badara participe activement au développement de la population de ces lieux.
texts.en:
Alioune Badara has been a teacher for 20 years. He is married and the father of 5 children, the eldest of whom is 16 years old and the youngest, 2. He lives with his family, including his wife, children and parents, and four of his brothers live in the house which reduces his costs as they contribute to the daily expenses.

Alioune Badara is one of the UIMCEC branch's original customers and has benefited from 7 loans which have been properly repaid. He owns a fishing boat which he wants to repair; this is what the loan he is requesting from UIMCEC will be used for. Alioune Badara has been able to improve his family's food conditions thanks to the profits from his fishing business. One day, he would like finish building his house, increase the size of his fishing boat and put an engine in it. This would also create jobs in the village, therefore Alioune Badara is actively participating in the development of the local population.

loans.use: to repair his fishing boat.

loans.name: Kanyange Group

texts.fr:
Samson fait partie du groupe  Kanyange et  habite à Bubanza. Il a 38 et est marié à Clairia. Ensemble ils ont 6 enfants  âgés de 3mois à 10 ans. 
I
Il fait le commerce de fruits (oranges, mangues, mandarins,…)   depuis 18 ans. 

C’est son premier  crédit à Turame. Avec le crédit KIVA qu’il obtient, il  va  augmenter son capital et acheter une grande quantité de fruits (oranges, mangues, mandarins,…) à revendre pour gagner plus. 

Dans les prochaines  années, il  voudrait acheter une moto et voir ses enfants étudier.
texts.en:
Samson is a member of the Kanyange group and lives in Bubanza. He is 38 years old and married to Clairia. The couple have 6 children together, aged between 3 months and 10 years old.

He has been selling fruit (oranges, mangoes, mandarins etc.) for 18 years. This is his first loan from Turame. His Kiva-sponsored credit will increase his working capital and allow him to buy a large amount of fruit (oranges, mangoes, mandarins etc.) which he will resell in order to earn more money. In the coming years, he would like to buy a motorbike and see that his children get an education.

loans.use: to buy a large quantity of fruit (oranges, mangoes, mandarins etc.) for resale.

loans.name: Helene

texts.fr: helene est une femme de 41 ans, célibataire et mère de 02 enfants âgés de 18 ans et de 08 ans. elle possède et gère un salon de coiffure dans un quartier de la ville depuis 2 ans. elle sollicite ce crédit pour renforcer son stock de marchandises en achetant les mèches et les produits cosmétiques afin d'augmenter ses ventes et ses bénéfices. les bénéfices ainsi générés vont permettre d'embellir son salon d'une part et d'améliorer les conditions de vie de sa famille d'autre part.
texts.en: Helene is a 41-year-old woman who is single and the mother of 2 children aged 18 and 8. She owns and has been running a hairdressing salon in a district of town for 2 years. She is requesting this loan in order to increase her inventory of hair extensions and beauty products, so that she can increase her sales and her profits. The profits generated by her business will allow her to decorate her salon and to improve her family's living conditions.

loans.use: to buy hair extensions and beauty products.

loans.name: Novikpokpo Assiko-Afagnagan Group

texts.fr: Veuve de 54ans, Mazonwonou est mère de 05 enfants. Elle est cultivatrice de profession et productrice de gari. Son activité se déroule à AFAGNAN(Localité située à 82km de la ville de Lomé. Elle sollicite son second crédit pour acheter du manioc afin de produire du gari. Elle espère disposer d'un stock suffisant de gari pour revendre et assurer le bien être de la famille. Elle est responsable d'un groupement constitué de femmes et d’hommes qui sont soient dans le commerce et dans l'élevage. Les membres espèrent comme la responsable disposer plus de stock et assurer le bien - être de la famille.
texts.en: A 54-year-old widow, Mazonwonou is the mother of 5 children. She is a farmer and makes cassava flour. Her business is located in Afagnan, which is situated 82 kilometres away from Lomé. She is requesting her second loan in order to buy cassava so that she can make cassava flour. She hopes to have enough cassava flour to sell that she can ensure her family's well-being. She is the leader of a group of women and men who are either retailers or breeders. The group members would also like to have more stock and to ensure their families' well-being.

loans.use: to buy cassava.

loans.name: Aitbubu

texts.ru: Айтбубу 41 год, не замужем, одна воспитывает 2 детей. У Айтбубу - среднее образование, в качестве основного дохода для своей семьи Айтбубу занимается животноводством, стартовав 4 года назад, с покупки скота на 4,000 сом KGS. Благодаря упорному труду Айтбубу, в ее хозяйстве на сегодняшний день имеется: 1 дойная корова, 1 теленок, 10 овец. Ежемесячный доход составляет 6,000 сом (KGS). В целях дальнейшего развития своего хозяйства, Айтбубу обратилась в Микрофинансовый банк «Бай –Тушум и Партнеры» за кредитом в сумме 100,000 сом (KGS) на покупку овец для увеличения поголовья скота. Доходы от кредита Айтбубу планирует вложить в дальнейшее приумножение количества домашней скотины, и планирует накопить средства на ремонт дома.
texts.en: Aitbubu is 41 years old, unmarried, and is raising her two children by herself. Aitbubu has a secondary education. As the main source of income for her family, Aitbubu practices livestock breeding. She started this business 4 years ago, with an initial purchase of cattle in the amount of 4,000 som (KGS). Thanks to Aitbubu's hard work, she currently has 1 milk cow, 1 calf and 10 sheep on her farm. Her monthly income is 6,000 som (KGS). For the purpose of further developing her business, Aitbubu turned to Microfinance Bank "Bai Tushum and Partners." She is requesting a loan in the amount of 100,000 som (KGS) to buy sheep to increase the size of her herd. Aitbubu plans to invest the earnings from the loan in the further acquisition of livestock. She also intends to save money to renovate her house.

loans.use: to buy sheep.

loans.name: Cholponkan

texts.ru: Чолпонкан 50 лет, замужем, вместе с супругом воспитывают 3 детей. Старшая дочь замужем, сыновья помогают по хозяйству. Супруг работает на местном предприятии весовщиком. У Чолпонкан - среднее образование, работает на протяжении 25 лет на фабрике весовщицей. В качестве дополнительного дохода для своей семьи Чолпонкан вместе со своей семьей занимается животноводством, стартовав 29 лет назад, с покупки скота на 3,000 сом KGS. Благодаря упорному труду Чолпонкан, в ее хозяйстве на сегодняшний день имеется: 2 дойные коровы, 1 лошадь. Ежемесячный доход составляет 15,000 сом (KGS). В целях дальнейшего развития своего хозяйства, Чолпонкан обратилась в Микрофинансовый банк «Бай –Тушум и Партнеры» за кредитом в сумме 135,000 сом (KGS) на покупку бычков и телок для откорма с последующей реализацией на рынке по высокой цене. Доходы от кредита Чолпонкан планирует вложить в дальнейшее приумножение количества домашней скотины, а также планируют собрать средства на свадьбу сына.
texts.en:
Cholponkan is 50 years old, married, and is raising three children with her husband. Her eldest daughter is married and her sons help with the housework. Her husband works as a weigher at a local utility. Cholponkan has a secondary education, and has been working in a factory as a weigher for 25 years. 

For additional income, Cholponkan and her family are involved in animal husbandry. They started 29 years ago with the purchase of a cow for 3,000 KGS. Through hard work in her business, Cholponkan now has two dairy cows and one horse. Her monthly income is 15,000 KGS. In order to grow her business, Cholponkan has applied for a 135,000 KGS loan at microfinance bank Bai Tushum and Partners. She plans to purchase steers and heifers to feed and subsequently resell on the market at a higher price. Cholponkan plans to invest income from the loan to further grow the number of domestic animals she keeps, as well as to save money for her son's wedding.

loans.use: to buy steers and heifers for fattening and resale

loans.name: Mairam

texts.ru: Майрам 66 лет, вдова, после смерти мужа сама воспитала троих детей, старший сын со снохой помогают по хозяйству и живут с матерью, остальные женаты и проживают отдельно. У Майрам - высшее образование, по специальности учитель кыргызского языка и литературы, работала в школе на протяжении 28 лет, сейчас находится на пенсии. Все местные жители очень тепло отзываются о Майрам, так как она воспитала и обучила не одно поколение учеников. Параллельно с 1974 года в  качестве дополнительного дохода для своей семьи Майрам занимается животноводством и полеводством, с покупки скота на 1,000 сом KGS. Благодаря упорному труду Майрам, в ее хозяйстве на сегодняшний день имеется: 2 дойные коровы, 2 лошади, 1 теленок, а также имеет земельный надел мерою 2,40 ГА на котором выращивает перец, фасоль и клевер.  Ежемесячный доход составляет 13,000 сом (KGS). В целях дальнейшего развития своего хозяйства, Майрам обратилась в Микрофинансовый банк «Бай –Тушум и Партнеры» за кредитом в сумме 60,000 сом (KGS) на покупку бычков для увеличения поголовья скота. Доходы от кредита Майрам планирует вложить в дальнейшее приумножение количества домашней скотины, и планирует накопить средства на ремонт дома.
texts.en:
Mairam is a 66-year-old widow. After her husband's death, she raised three children by herself.  Her oldest son and daughter-in-law live with their mother and help with the housework, while the rest are married and live separately. 

Mairam has a college education, and is a teacher of Kyrgyz language and literature. She worked at the school for 28 years, is now retired. All of the locals relate very warmly to Karamat, as she raised and trained a generation of students. 

In parallel, Mairam has earned additional income for her family since 1974 through livestock and field crops from cattle purchased for 1,000 KGS.  Thanks to Mairam's hard work, she now has two milk cows, two horses, one calf and a 2.40 hectare plot of land on which she grows peppers, beans and clover. Her monthly income is 13,000 KGS. 

In order to further grow her business, Mairam has applied for a 60,000 KGS loan from the microfinance bank Bai Tushum and Partners in order to purchase steers to increase her livestock count.  Mairam plans to invest income from loan to further grow the number of domestic animals and plans to save enough money to repair her house.

loans.use: to buy steers

loans.name: La Patience Group

texts.fr: La cliente Mwengesyali est une conseillère de l’association  d’affaire « Patience», jeune entrepreneur expérimentée, dynamique, âgée de 33 ans  et mère de 7 enfants qui étudient tous. Son conjoint est commerçant de divers. La cliente est une vendeuse de souliers. Elle installe ses marchandises au marché public. Elle commença ses affaires avec l’assistance de son mari. Plus tard, elle bénéficia le prêt de l’IMF Hekima. Il y a 6 ans qu’elle exerce cette activité. Ce nouveau prêt va la servir d’acheter 5 ballons de souliers. Ainsi, elle souhaite étendre son projet de commerce et construire une maison pour ses enfants. L’insécurité dans la province est un défi pour l’avancement de ses affaires. Au finish, elle remercie fortement Hekima pour l’autonomisation des femmes entrepreneurs non bancables, surtout ; pendant ce moment critique de guerre à l’Est du pays.
texts.en: Mwengesyali, the customer, is an advisor to the "Patience" business group. A young, experienced and dynamic entrepreneur, she is 33 years old and the mother of 7 children who all attend school. He spouse is a retailer of various products. She sells shoes and displays her merchandise at the public market. She started her business with help from her husband and later benefited from loans from the MFI Hekima. She has been in this line of work for 6 years. This new loan will enable her to buy 5 bales of shoes. She would like to expand her business and build a house for her children. The insecurity in the region is a challenge to the progress of her business. Finally, she would like to strongly thank Hekima for helping to make non-bankable women entrepreneurs self-sufficient, especially in this critical time of war in the east of the country.

loans.use: to buy 5 bales of shoes.

location.country: The Democratic Republic of the Congo

loans.name: Jovita

texts.es:
La socia se sigue dedicando al negocio de compra y venta de granos,la socia vende trigo,cebada y maiz,la socia ya tiene varios años en este negocio y le va muy bien,la socia tambien tiene una ferreteria y le va muy bien,el sueño de la socia es tener un local donde puede vender los cereales.La socia solicita el credito para comprar trigo,cebada y maiz.

La socia esrta feliz y se compromete a cumplir los pagos de su cuota.
texts.en:
Jovita continues her business of buying and selling grains. She sells wheat, barley, and corn. She has been in this business for several years now and it is going well for her, as is her other business, a hardware store. 

Her dream is to have a physical store where she can sell grain. She reuqests the loan for the purchase of wheat, barley, and corn. 


Jovita is happy and promises to make her monthly payments.

loans.use: to buy wheat, barley, and corn.

loans.name: Luz Marina

texts.es:
Ls socia se sigue dedicando al negocio de tienda de abarrotes,la socia vende arroz,azucar,leche y aceite entre otros,la socia trabaja desde las 8:00 a.m hasta las 6:00 p.m,la socia por medio de este negocio quiere salir adelante,el sueño de la socia es ampliar el negocio de tienda de abarrotes.La socia solicita el credito para comprar arroz,azucar y leche.

La socia esta contenta con el credito otorgado y se compromete a cumplir los pagos de su cuota.
texts.en:
Luz Marina continues to run her grocery store. She sells rice, sugar, milk, and oil, among other products. She works from 8:00 AM to 6:00 PM. She wants to get ahead by means of her business, and her dream is to expand her grocery store. She requests the loan to buy rice, sugar, and milk.

She is happy with the loan given to her and promises to make her payments.

loans.use: to buy rice, sugar, and milk.

loans.name: Wendy De Jesus

texts.es:
Wendy, ha decidido solicitar más capital para comprar cerdos, concentrado y vitaminas, para engordarlos y ofreceros después a sus clientes, espera de esta manera tener un aumento en sus ganancias, un negocio más competitivo. Con la inversión que hizo antes ella mejoro su economía, cancelo bien su deuda, y oporto más para los gastos de du su hogar.
Es madre nuevamente, su familia está unida y conserva el mismo núcleo familiar, todos se encuentran saludables y no han tenido dificultades para continuar administrando el negocio.
texts.en:
Wendy decided to request a new loan to buy more pigs, feed and vitamins, to raise her pigs and sell them to her clients. She expects to increase her income this way, while making her business more competitive.

With previous investments, she was able to improve her capital, she repaid her loans, and covered additional household expenses.

Wendy just had her second child, her family continues to grow strong together, they are all  well and healthy, and they haven’t encounter any difficulties in reference to the administration of the business.

loans.use: to buy pigs, feed and vitamins.

loans.name: Nurzada

texts.ru: Нурзаде 26 лет, замужем, вместе с супругом воспитывают 2 сыновей дошкольного возраста детей. У Нурзады - средне-специальное образование.  В качестве основного дохода для своей семьи Нурзада занимается животноводством, стартовав 8 лет назад, с покупки скота на 10,000 сом KGS. Благодаря упорному труду Нурзады, в ее хозяйстве на сегодняшний день имеется: 2 дойные коровы, 14 овец и 33 козы. Ежемесячный доход составляет 15,000 сом (KGS). Нурзада входит в группу "Кызыл-Кыя", в эту группу входят еще 2 человека. В итоге их трое. Нурзада является лидером группы. Уважаема в своей группе, пунктуальная, корректна в общении, имеет большой опыт работы в сельском хозяйстве, знает всю технологию животноводства. В целях дальнейшего развития своего хозяйства, Нурзада обратилась в Микрофинансовый банк «Бай –Тушум и Партнеры» за кредитом в сумме 100,000 сом (KGS) на покупку овец для увеличения поголовья скота. Доходы от кредита Нурзада планирует вложить в дальнейшее приумножение количества домашней скотины, и планирует накопить средства на ремонт сарая, точнее пристроить второй ярус для хранения сена.
texts.en: Nurzada is 26 years old, married, and together with her husband, is raising two preschool-aged sons. Nurzada has a secondary specialized education.  As the main source of income for her family, Nurzada practices livestock breeding. She started this business 8 years ago, with an initial purchase of cattle in the amount of 10,000 som (KGS). Thanks to Nurzada's hard work, she currently has 2 milk cows, 14 sheep and 33 goats on her farm. Her monthly income is 15,000 som (KGS). Nurzada is in the farming group "Kyzyl-Kiya." There are already two other people in this group, with three members altogether. Nurzada is the group leader. She is respected in her group, punctual, articulate, has a lot of experience in agriculture and knows all the technical aspects of farming. For the purpose of further developing her business, Nurzada turned to Microfinance Bank "Bai Tushum and Partners." She is requesting a loan in the amount of 100,000 som (KGS) to buy sheep to increase the size of her herd. Nurzada plans to invest the earnings from the loan in the further acquisition of livestock. She also intends to save money to renovate her barn, namely to construct a second tier to store hay.

loans.use: to buy sheep.

loans.name: Germain Fere

texts.fr: Germain est un homme de 32 ans, célibataire et père d'un enfant âgé de 9 ans. Il est commerçant dans un marché de la place depuis quelles que années. Il commercialise des vivres frais ( manioc, macabo, igname) en fonction des saisons. Son activité se déroule dans des bonnes conditions mais  est très souvent confrontée à un problème de rupture de stock suite à la demande très élevée de sa clientèle au jour le jour. C'est pour palier à ce problème qu'il s'est tourné vers nous pour sollicité un crédit, celui ci lui permettra d'acquérir une autonomie et de pouvoir faire de grande livraisons. Les bénéfices qui en résulteront seront d'une part réinvestis dans l'activité et le reste lui permettra de prendre soin de sa famille.
texts.en:
Germain, age 32, is unmarried and the father of a 9-year-old child. For some years, he's been a merchant in one of the local markets. He sells fresh products, such as cassava, arrowleaf elephant ear (a tuber-producing plant), and yams, depending on the season.

His business is carried out under good conditions, but very often, Germain is facing supply shortages, due to high day-to-day customer demand. To overcome this problem, he's seeking a loan from Kiva's partner, ACEP Cameroun. This will enable him to get autonomous and make bigger deliveries.

He will reinvest one part of the resulting profits in his business, the remainder will enable him to take care of his family.

loans.use: to increase his stock of fresh products

loans.name: Carmen Rosa

texts.es: Carmen Rosa es una persona muy alegre y emprendedora que a pesar de las adversidades saca adelante a su familia y vive en la ciudad de Salvación, ella continua enseñando en uno de los centros educativos de la zona y sigue siendo parte del banco comunal “Tesoritos del Manu” y en esta oportunidad requiere el préstamo para  hacer mantenimiento de la casa va refaccionar las habitaciones y el techo pues se están acercando las épocas de lluvias. Agradece y valora el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con el pago de sus cuotas mensuales.
texts.en:
Carmen Rosa is a very cheerful and enterprising person. Inspite of facing obstacles, she is getting her family ahead. She lives in the city of Salvación.  Carmen Rosa still teaches in the education centres in the area and still belongs to the "Tesoritos de Manu" communal bank.

This time, she needs a loan to improve her home. She wants to refurbish the rooms and to repair the roof because the rainy season is approaching.

She is thankful for the loan and values it. She promises to repay her monthly quotas.

loans.use: to improve her home: to refurbish the rooms and repair the roof.

location.town: Salvacion - Manu - Manu - Madre de Dios

loans.name: Claudio

texts.es: Claudio es un buen padre familia pues tiene dos hijos, el nació en la ciudad de Quillabamba pero actualmente  vive en la ciudad de Salvación.  (La ciudad de Salvación está ubicada en el distrito del Manu en la provincia de Manu dentro del departamento de Madre de Dios, Perú), el tiene 55 años de edad y su labor cotidiano es la agricultura pues tiene varios terrenos de cultivos donde cosecha piñas, plátanos, yucas, hojas de coca, cítricos, papayas y otras cosas más, él perteneces al banco comunal “Tesoritos del Manu” y en esta oportunidad requiere el préstamo para comprar mercadería como fertilizantes. Agradece y valora el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con el pago de sus cuotas mensuales.
texts.en:
Claudio, a caring father of two, was born in the city of Quillabamba but currently lives in the city of Salvacion (located in the district Manu, in the region of Madre de Dios, in Peru). 

He is 55 years old and works in agriculture every day, as he owns various fields where he grows pineapple, plantains, yucca, cocoa leaves, citrus, papayas and more. Claudio is a member of the communal bank “Tesoritos del Manu” and he is currently requesting this loan to buy supplies like fertilizers. He is thankful and values this loan, and commits to make the monthly payments.

loans.use: to buy supplies like fertilizers.

location.town: Salvacion - Manu - Manu - Madre de Dios

loans.name: Yanet

texts.es:
La socia se sigue dedicando al negocio de crianza de animales como cuyes y gallinas,la socia los hace engordar y crecer y luego los vende en las diferentes ferias,la socia trabaja desde las 8:00 a.m hasta las 5:00 p.m,la socia ya tiene varios años en este negocio y le va muy bien,el sueño de la socia es tener un local donde pueda vender los animales.La socia solicita el credito para comprar cuyes y gallinas.

La socia se siente agradecida por el credito otorgado y se compromete a cumplir con sus cuotas establecidas.
texts.en:
This member continues to work raising animals such as guinea pigs and chickens. She raises them, fattens them up and sells them at different markets. She works from 8:00 a.m until 5:00 p.m. She has worked in this field for many years and it is going very well for her. Her dream is to have a store where she can sell her animals. 

This member has requested a loan to buy guinea pigs and chickens. She is grateful for the loan she has been granted and promises to make her repayments on time.

loans.use: to buy guinea pigs and chickens

loans.name: Jessica

texts.es: Jessica es una persona muy alegre y emprendedora que a pesar de las adversidades sale adelante y vive en la ciudad de Salvación, ella nació en la ciudad de Lima y tiene 27 años de edad actualmente ella trabaja en una entidad del estado pero en sus horas libres se dedica a la venta de carne y pollo y le va muy bien en vista que el negocio creció una vecinas le invitaron a participar en el banco comunal “Tesoritos del Manu” y en esta oportunidad requiere el préstamo para comprar una congeladora pues es importante para el negocio. Agradece y valora el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con el pago de sus cuotas mensuales.
texts.en:
Jessica is a very cheerful and self-starting person who, in spite of adversity, is moving forward. She lives in the city of Salvación and was born in the city of Lima. She is 27 years old and currently works for a government agency, but in her free time she works selling meat and chicken. It is going very well for her. Seeing that her business grew, some neighbors invited her to become part of the communal bank ''Tesoritos del Manu'' and, at this opportunity, she needs a loan to buy a freezer as it is important for her business.

She is grateful for and values the loan, and promises to make her monthly payments.

loans.use: to buy a freezer

location.town: Salvacion - Manu - Manu - Madre de Dios

loans.name: Gregoria

texts.es: Gregoria es una persona alegre que vive en la ciudad de Salvación  y continua con la venta de helados de diferentes sabores. Ya son varios años que se dedica al negocio y ve la muy bien gracias al empeño que pone en su trabajo. Ella agradece a los inversionitas por el apoyo y se siente feliz pues va continuar en el banco comunal “Tesoritos del Manu” y en esta oportunidad requiere el préstamo para comprar insumos como por ejemplo frutas, azúcar, saborizantes y se compromete a cumplir con el pago de sus cuotas mensuales.
texts.en: Gregoria is a happy person who lives in the city of Salvación and continues selling different flavored ice cream. She has been dedicated to this business for many years and it's going well thanks to the hard work she exerts in her job. She is thankful to the investors for their support and feels happy since she will continue with the community bank, "Tesoritos del Manu" (Manu's treasure). At this time, she requires a loan to buy ingredients like, for example, fruit, sugar, flavorings and she promises to make her monthly payments.

loans.use: to buy ingredients such as sacks of sugar, flavoring, and other items.

location.town: Salvacion - Manu - Manu - Madre de Dios

loans.name: Yader Yacer

texts.es: Yader tiene 12 años de habitar en la comunidad de san remigio ahí vive con su mama y una hermana.Comenta que con sacrificios de su madre se preparo y estudio  ingeniería hoy en día el se esfuerza y trabaja duro  para ayudar a su madre y no le falte nada y así por lo menos retribuir algo de lo que ella le dio . Su hermana trabajan en una cooperativa de explotación de camarón y el se dedica a la agricultura alquila terrenos y ahí siembra maíz y frijoles y le va muy bien pues saca buenas cosechas la que vende a comerciantes de la zona y otra parte la deja para consumo del hogar. En esta comunidad no hay energía eléctrica y por las noches la vida es triste y aburrida ya que no pueden compartir y hacer otras actividades es por esos que desea hacer  un tramite de crédito para comprar un sistema solar para la vivienda.
texts.en: Yader has lived in the community of San Remigio for twelve years. There he lives with his mother and a sister. He comments that, with the sacrifices of his mother, he prepared and studied engineering. Today he works hard to help his mother and she wants for nothing so at least he can pay something back for what she gave him. His sister works in a shrimp farm cooperative and he is dedicated to farming, renting land where he grows maize and beans. It is going very well since he has good harvests that he sells to traders in the area and he keeps another portion to consume at home. In this community, there is no electricity and, at night, life is sad and boring since they cannot share and do other activities. For this reason, he wishes to make a loan submission so he can buy a solar power system for the house.

loans.use: to buy a solar power system to have energy in his house.

loans.name: Akiba Group

texts.fr: La cliente Maseka est une conseillère de l’association  d’affaire « Akiba», jeune entrepreneur expérimentée, dynamique, âgée de 27 ans, célibataire, sans aucun enfant. La cliente est une vendeuse de bassins plastics. Elle installe ses marchandises au marché public. Elle commença ses affaires avec l’assistance de ses parents.  Plus tard, elle bénéficia le prêt de l’IMF Hekima. Il y a 4 ans qu’elle exerce cette activité. Ce nouveau prêt va la servir d’acheter 48 bassins plastics. Ainsi, elle souhaite  étendre son projet de commerce et soutenir ses parents dans les projets de constriction d’une maison. L’insécurité dans la province est un défi pour l’avancement de ses affaires. Au finish, elle remercie fortement Hekima pour l’autonomisation des femmes entrepreneurs non bancables, surtout ; pendant ce moment critique de guerre à l’Est du pays.
texts.en:
Maseka, age 27, is a counselor for Akiba Group. She's an experimented and energetic entrepreneur, unmarried, and without children, She sells plastic basins at the public market. 

She started her business with her parent's help. Later on, she obtained a loan from Kiva's partner, the MFI Hekima. She's been running this business for four years.

This new loan will be used to buy 48 plastic basins. Thusly, she wishes to expand her business and help her parents build a house. Insecurity in the province is a challenge to the development of her business.

In the end, she strongly thanks Hekima for its contribution to make women who are excluded by traditional banks self-supporting, especially during this critical time of war in the East of the country.

loans.use: to buy 48 plastic basins

location.country: The Democratic Republic of the Congo

loans.name: Eugenio Alejandro

texts.es: Eugenio es un señor esforzado que trabaja a diario para mantener los gastos de su hogar y el de sus hijos para que vayan a la escuela, es soltero y solo  busca la manera de apoyar a su familia, su actividad de trabajo es la de tornero, labor que desempeña en un taller de tornos y los fines de semana se ocupa en soldadura, cuando hay trabajos en casas particulares. Eugenio solicita este crédito para instalar servicios higiénicos con sus tuberías y aguas negras, para esto el necesita comprar los materiales como tubos pvc, pega, cemento, arena, inodoro, ducha y sus accesorios, con esta inversión esta familia podrá vivir en mejores condiciones físicas y gozar de un ambiente más limpio, ya que en la actualidad lo que utilizan es una letrina.
texts.en:
Eugenio is a hard-working man who works every day in order to provide for the expenses of the household and to be able to send his children to school. He is is single and is looking for ways to support his family. He is working as a lathe operator in a lathe workshop and on the weekends he works in welding when there is work to be done in private homes.

Eugenio is asking for this loan in order to install a bathroom with sewage pipes. For this he needs to buy materials like PVC pipes, glue, cement, sand, a toilet, a shower, and accessories. With this investment, his family will live in better conditions and enjoy a cleaner environment, as currently they are using a latrine.

loans.use: to buy PVC pipes, glue, cement, sand, a toilet, a shower, and accessories.

loans.name: Maria Consuelo

texts.es:
La socia se sigue dedicando al negocio de crianza de animales como gallinas,cuyes y chanchos,la socia los hace negordar y luego los vende en las diferentes ferias,la socia ya tiene 8 años en este negocio y le va muy bien,el sueño de la socia es tener un local donde pueda vender loa animales.La socia solicita el credito para comprar pollos,cuyes y chanchos y tambien para comprar alimentos para los animales.


La socia se encuentra agradecida por la oportunidad brindada mediante este medio y así mismo se compromete a cumplir con el pago correspondiente al cronograma.
texts.en:
This member is still working raising animals such as chickens, guinea pigs and pigs. She fattens them up and later sells them in different markets. This member has now been working in this field for eight years and it is going really well for her. Her dream is to have a store where she can sell her animals from. 

This member is requesting a loan to buy chickens, guinea pigs and pigs as well as feed for the animals. She is grateful for the opportunity she has been provided and promises to make her repayments on time.

loans.use: to buy chickens, guinea pigs and pigs as well as feed for the animals

loans.name: Doylita Lus

texts.es:
Doylita tiene 37 años de edad, vive en la ciudad de Pucallpa al lado de sus 3 hijos a quienes quiere mucho y por los cuales lucha cada día para salir adelante; es por ello que Doylita se dedica a la agricultura desde hace 17 años, Doylita le gusta mucho lo que hace, es por ello que cree que le va bien en su labor.

Doylita esta agradecida con los prestamistas kiva ya que gracias a la ayuda que le han brindado ella podrá comprar fertilizantes, abono, entre otros, así como también poder solventar los gasto de regadío de su cultivo de yuca, de esta manera podrá seguir luchando para poder hacer realidad su gran sueño:” Tener una mejor vivienda”.
texts.en:
Doylita is 37 years old. She lives in the city of Pucallpa with her three children whom she loves very much and for whom she strives every day to get ahead. This is also why Doylita has been working in farming for 17 years. Doylita loves what she does and thinks that this is the reason why she is doing well in her work.

Doylita is grateful to the Kiva lenders, as thanks to the help they have provided she can buy fertilizers and manure, among others, and she will also be able to cover the expenses for the irrigation of her yucca crop. By this she will be able to continue striving to realize her great dream: "To have a better home".

loans.use: to buy manure, fertilizers, etc.

loans.name: Bernardino

texts.es: El señor Bernardino es de araní tiene 47 años, estudio hasta nivel primario porque sus padres eran de escasos recursos económicos y no pudo continuar con sus estudios, hace 2 años falleció su pareja y actualmente vive con sus 3 hijos a los que educa y mantiene económicamente,  Llego al Trópico hace 22 años  y se compró un parcela para poder trabajar en la agricultura y mantener a su familia, tenía cultivos anuales como ser yuca y arroz, pero hace 10 años que emprendió la producción de banano con la ayuda de sus hijos, comercializa en el mercado local pero como quiere exportar necesita tener banano de buena calidad,  por ello solicita un crédito para realizar un mantenimiento de banano y  mejorar su producción.
texts.en:
Bernardino is from Araní and is 47 years old. After primary school, he could not continue his studies because his parents had little economic resources. Two years ago his partner died, and at present he lives with his three children. He raises the children and provides for them economically.

He arrived in Trópico 22 yeras ago and bought a plot in order to be able to work in farming and to provide for his family. He used to have annual plants like yucca and rice, but 10 years ago he started to plant bananas with the help of his children. He sells the bananas in the local market, but he also wants to export and therefore needs to have bananas of a good quality.

Thus he is asking for a loan to maintain his crop and improve the quality of his bananas.

loans.use: to maintain his banana crop.

loans.name: Rosenda

texts.en:
Rosenda is a 44-year-old woman from the town of Ubay, Bohol. She is married with five grown children. She goes fishing and sells fish to help augment the income of their household. Aside from fishing, she also engages in a food-vending business as an additional source of income. Her business started more than 20 years ago. She is asking for a loan to buy additional pigs and more fish to continue her business activities.

In the future, Rosenda hopes to expand her business and increase her profitability for a sustainable livelihood.

loans.use: to buy additional pigs and more fish.

loans.name: Elizabeth

texts.es:
Elizabeth una mujer joven de 33 años de edad, con deseos de superación. Actualmente, vive con su madre y su padre. Es la encargada de cuidar sus 2 sobrinas de edades 9 y 14 años. 

Elizabeth se dedica al corte y confección desde hace 5 años, oficio que lo aprendió, gracias a una institución llamada fomilenio que impartió talleres vocacionales en la zona norte del país. Gracias a esa valiosa ayuda está trabajando, para la escuela del cantón haciendo uniformes para los alumnos.

Con el préstamo, se le estará ayudando, para que pueda comprar maíz, ya que en esta época del año los precios del maíz, no están muy altos y es por eso que quiere tener sus granos básicos, para el gasto del otro año antes de que suban de precio.

 En un futuro quiere tener una familia y una bonita vivienda.
texts.en:
Elizabeth is a young 33 year old woman whose goal is to improve herself. She currently lives with her mother and father and looks after two nieces who are 9 and 14. 

Elizabeth has worked in dressmaking for five years. She learnt this trade thanks to an institution called Fomilenio which gave vocational workshops in the north of the country. Thanks to this valuable assistance Elizabeth is working for the school in her canton making uniforms for the students. 

With this loan Elizabeth will receive help to buy corn, As this is the time of year when the price of corn is not very high, she wants to buy pulses before the price goes up in the new year.

In the future Elizabeth wants to have a family and a beautiful house.

loans.use: to buy corn

loans.name: Judy Betty

texts.es:
Judy Betty tiene 41 años de edad, vive junto a su esposo e hijos en el distrito de Oyotun, su población se dedica a la agricultura, comercio y ganadería a dos horas del la ciudad de Chiclayo, costa norte del Perú.

Ella se dedica a la crianza y venta de animales menores en su domicilio, nos comenta que se dedica a esta actividad para apoyar a su esposo con los gastos del colegio de sus hijos.

Betty ha solicitado un préstamo de 1 000 nuevos soles para la compra de alimentos balanceados y de esta manera tener una mejor producción para ofrecer a sus clientes, generándole mayores ingresos para su familia.
texts.en:
Judy Betty is 41 years old, she lives with her husband and her sons in the Oyotun district, two hours from Chiclayo, in the Northern coast of Peru, where the population primarily works in agriculture, commerce and livestock. 

Judy raises and sells small farm animals in her own home, in order to support her husband with the education expenses of the children’s school. 

Judy is requesting a loan of 1000 nuevos soles to buy feed, to improve her business productivity and offer a greater selection to her customers, increasing in this way the family income.

loans.use: to buy feed for her farm animals.

loans.name: Julli Ivonne

texts.es:
Julli Ivonne tiene 41 años de edad, vive junto a su esposo y sus hijos, en el distrito de Zaña, la principal fuente de económica de su población es la agricultura, gracias a los canales de regadío construido por la cultura Moche, también se dedican al comercio y ganadería, a una hora con cuarenta y cinco minutos de la ciudad de Chiclayo, costa norte del Perú.

Ella es conocida en la zona por su labor de preparación y venta de comida, arroz con pato, caldo de gallina, tallarines con pollo entre otros, su negocio está ubicado en su propio domicilio.

Ha solicitado un préstamo a Edpyme Alternativa de 3 000 nuevos soles para la compra de una cocina de gas, mesas y sillas para equipar el local donde ofrece la venta de comida y de esta manera tener mayores ingresos para su familia.
texts.en:
Julli Ivonne  is 41 years old  and lives with her husband and children in the Zaña district. Her town is an hour and 45 minutes from the city of Chiclayo, on the northern coast of Peru. Its main source of income is agriculture, thanks to the irrigation channels built by the Moche civilization. They also work in trade and livestock. 

Julli Ivonne is known locally for the work she does preparing and selling food. She makes rice with duck, chicken broth, noodles with chicken, and other foods. Her business is located in her home.

She has requested a loan from Edpyme Alternativa of 3000 PEN to buy a gas stove, tables, and chiars to outfit the location where she sells the food. In this way she can make a better income for her family.
Ha solicitado un préstamo a Edpyme Alternativa de 3 000 nuevos soles para la compra de una cocina de gas, mesas y sillas para equipar el local donde ofrece la venta de comida y de esta manera tener mayores ingresos para su familia.

loans.use: to buy a gas stove, tables, and chairs for her place of business

loans.name: Jacquelin  Adriana

texts.es: Jacquelin es una joven muy emprendedora de 23 años de edad, originaria de la ciudad de Managua. Casada y madre de un hijo. Es de oficio comerciante, se dedica a la venta de verduras. Inicio este negocio a la edad de 16 años, vendiendo en uno de los mercados de la ciudad, siendo inculcada por su mamá. Ella a pesar de su corta edad, decide tener su propio negocio. Hoy en día, con mucho esfuerzo ha logrado salir adelante con su familia. Su meta es mejorar las condiciones de su vivienda. Solicita el crédito para comprar verduras tales como: papas, repollo, tomate, chiltomas, ayote, entre otros, con el fin de surtir su mercadería. Estima que este crédito le será de ayuda, ya que aumentara sus productos y podrá brindar diversidad de verduras a sus clientes. Su plan futuro es mejorar la infraestructura de su negocio.
texts.en: Jacquelin is a very entrepreneurial young woman who is 23. She is a native of the city of Managua. She is married and a mother to one child. She is a merchant dedicated to selling vegetables. She began this business at the age of 16, selling in one of the markets of the city, being taught by her mother. Despite her young age, she decided to have her own business. Today, with a lot of effort, she has managed to get her family ahead. Her goal is to improve the condition of her house. She requests the loan to buy vegetables like potatoes, cabbage, tomatoes, bell peppers, squash, among others, with the goal of stocking her merchandise. She believes this loan will be useful since it will expand her products and she will be able to provide a diversity of vegetables to her customers. Her future plan is to improve the infrastructure of her business.

loans.use: to buy vegetables like potatoes, cabbage, tomatoes, bell peppers, squash, among others.

loans.name: Mugina Group

texts.fr:
Odette fait partie du groupe  Mugina  et  habite à Cibitoke. Elle a 22ans et est mariée à Daniel. Ensemble ils ont 1 enfant  de 3 ans.

Elle fait le commerce de  boutique (bassins, casseroles,riz,..)  depuis 3 ans. 

C’est son premier crédit à Turame. Avec le crédit KIVA qu’elle obtient, elle  va  augmenter son capital et acheter une douzaine de casseroles, une douzaine de bassins et 50kg de riz à revendre pour gagner plus. 

Dans les prochaines  années, elle voudrait acheter des terres cultivables, une parcelle pour construire une maison en matériaux durables et voir ses enfants continuer les études.
texts.en: Odette is a member of the Mugina group and lives in Cibitoke. She is 22 years old and married to Daniel. The couple have a 3-year-old child. Odette has been selling products in a shop for 3 years. This is her first loan from Turame. Her Kiva-sponsored loan will increase her working capital and allow her to buy a dozen casserole dishes, a dozen basins and 50 kilos of rice to resell, so that she can earn more money. In the coming years, she would like to buy some arable land, a plot of land on which to build a house made from durable materials and to see her children get an education.

loans.use: to buy a dozen casserole dishes, a dozen basins and 50 kilos of rice.

loans.name: Ratamalgre Group

texts.fr:
Mr GILBERT est responsable du groupe RATAMALGRE. Marié, il est père de 02 enfants. Le plus âgé a 04ans et le moins âgé a 09mois. 01 va à l’école. Il a 03personnes en charge.
Mr est commerçant (gère une boutique) depuis 12ans. Il s’approvisionne dans  marchés de la ville. Ses clients sont les dames et hommes du quartier.
Il veut s’acheter plusieurs articles de boutique.
Mr veut réinvestir ses bénéfices dans sa boutique. Il ambitionne transformer sa boutique en magasin et s’acheter une parcelle pour sa famille.
texts.en:
Gilbert is the leader of the Ratamalgre group. He is married and the father of 2 children, the eldest of whom is 4 years old and the youngest, 9 months. He has 3 more dependents.

Gilbert is a retailer and has been running a shop for 12 years. He gets his supplies at the markets in town. His customer are local women and men. He would like to buy several items for his shop. He wishes to reinvest in his business. His ambition is to transform his shop into a warehouse and to buy a plot of land for his family.

loans.use: several items for his shop.

loans.name: Fraternite De Sondgo Group

texts.fr:
Mme DJENEBA est responsable du groupe FRATERNITE DE SONDGO. Mariée, elle est mère de 03enfants. Le plus âgé a 22ans et le moins âgé a 06ans. 03 vont à l’école. 
Mme vend des pagnes, chaussures, etc. depuis plus de 05ans. Elle s’approvisionne à Lomé, Mali et Bobo. Ses clients sont les villages environnants.
Elle veut s’acheter divers marchandises (20douzaines de chaussures, des sacs à main, etc.).
Mme veut épargner   ses bénéfices et réinvestir dans son activité. Elle ambitionne agrandir son activité et  assurer l’avenir de  ses enfants.
texts.en: Djeneba is the leader of the Fraternité De Sondgo group. She is married and the mother of 3 children, the eldest of whom is 22 years old and the youngest, 6. Three of her children attend school. Djeneba has been selling things like pagnes (highly colourful and decorative West African clothing) and shoes for over 5 years. She gets her supplies from Lomé, Mali and Bobo. Her customers are people from the surrounding villages. She would like to buy more merchandise, including 20 dozen pairs of shoes and handbags. She would like to save her profits and reinvest them in her business. Her aim is to expand her business and ensure a good future for her children.

loans.use: to buy merchandise (20 dozen pairs of shoes, handbags etc.).

loans.name: Sreyoun

texts.en:
A mother of five children, Sreyoun is 40 years old and makes a living via rice farming in Takeo Province. To assist her in earning more income to support this large household, her husband works as a paid worker in Thailand. 

Including this loan, Sreyoun is a third-time borrower with VisionFund (Kiva’s partner). The past loans, which she has repaid back with success, have helped her to pay the education costs for her one remaining daughter until the tertiary level. However, it is getting to be quite a burden to cover the school fees for her daughter. 

Hence, she decided to take an education loan with VisionFund (Kiva's partner). She hopes that she can support her daughter to achieve her dream of pursuing a bachelor's degree with a major in accounting.

loans.use: To cover the education cost for her daughter.

loans.name: Jhon Jairo

texts.es:
Jhon es un joven que tiene 20años y trabaja como operador de costura en una pequeña empresa textil de su ciudad, con lo cual puede tener ingresos para salir adelante.

Jhon agradece la ayuda que le brindan los prestamistas kiva ya que gracias a la ayuda que le han brindado ella podrá comprar una refrigeradora para su vivienda ya que actualmente no tienen donde conservar sus alimentos y de esta manera podra ir mejorando su calidad de vida y luchar por hacer realidad su gran sueño:”Tener una empresa textil”.
texts.en:
Jhon is a 20 year old young man who works as a sewing machine operator in a small textile business in the city, which provides him with an income to help him get ahead. 

Jhon is grateful for the help that Kiva lenders offer him. Thanks to their assistance, he will be able to buy a fridge for his home, since he has nowhere to keep his food at the moment. He will be able to improve his quality of life and strive to make his dream of having a textile business come true.

loans.use: to buy a fridge

loans.name: Luis

texts.es:
Luis tiene 47 años de edad, vive junto a sus dos hijos, en el distrito de La Matanza, su población se dedica al comercio de animales menores, agricultura y ganadería a dos horas de la ciudad de Morropon, ubicado en la Región Piura, costa norte del Perú.

El se dedica a la venta de limón acido, desde hace 7 años, los distribuye en los restaurants de su distrito, es muy conocido en la zona por la labor a la que se dedica ha solicitado un préstamo de 4 000 nuevos soles para comprar una gran cantidad de limón para distribuirlo en los mercados de Chiclayo y de esta manera tener mayores ingresos para su familia.
texts.en:
Luis is 47 and lives with his two children in La Matanza district, which is two hours from Morropon city in the Piura region on the northern coast of Peru. Its population works in small animal commerce, agriculture and stock-breeding.

Luis has been selling acid lemons for 7 years. He sells the lemons in the restaurants of his district and is well known in the area for his work. He is asking for a loan of 4,000 nuevos soles [PEN] in order to buy a large number of lemons to sell in the markets of Chiclayo, and in this way to improve his family's income.

loans.use: to buy acid lemons to sell in the markets.

loans.name: Fe Felicita

texts.es:
Fe Felicita tiene 54 años de edad, vive junto a su esposo y su menor hijo en el distrito de Oyotún, una zona rural, donde su población se dedica a la agricultura, comercio y ganadería, a dos horas de la ciudad de Chiclayo, costa norte del Perú.

Junto a su familia tienen una bodeguita que ofrecen productos de primera necesidad, tiene buena clientela, por lo que ha solicitado un préstamo de 1 000 nuevos soles para la compra de frutas, verduras y golosinas para hacer crecer su negocio y de esta manera tener mayores ingresos para su familia.
texts.en:
Fe Felicita is 54 years old. She lives alongside her husband and their youngest son in the district of Oyotun, a rural area where the population is dedicated to farming, trade and livestock, two hours from the city of Chiclayo on the north coast of Peru.

Along with her family, she has a small shop that offers basic need products. She has good customers so she has requested a loan of 1000 PEN to buy fruit, vegetables, and candies to grow her business and have greater income for her family.

loans.use: to buy vegetables, fruits and candies to stock her little shop.

loans.name: Maria Guillermina

texts.es:
María Guillermina tiene 66 años de edad, vive junto a su esposo en el distrito de Oyotun, su población se dedica a la agricultura, comercio y ganadería a dos horas de la ciudad de Chiclayo, costa norte del Perú.

Ella se dedica a la crianza y venta de animales de corral, desde hace 6 años, su negocio se encuentra ubicado en su domicilio.

María ha solicitado un préstamo de 800 nuevos soles para la compra de alimentos balanceados y así tener una mejor producción, y una segunda parte para la compra de gallinas ponedoras y ofrecer los huevos en el mercado de la zona, generándole mayores ingresos para su familia.
texts.en:
María Guillermina is 66 years old and lives with her husband in Oyotun, a district where people works in agriculture, trade and livestock, located two hours away from Chiclayo, in the northern coast of Peru.

She works raising and selling farm animals. She has been doing this for six years now and works at home.

María has requested a loan of 800 nuevos soles [PEN] to buy animal feed in order to improve her production. She will also buy laying hens and start selling eggs at the local market with the intention to increase her family’s income.

loans.use: to buy animal feed and laying hens.

loans.name: Roman Antonio

texts.es: Don Ramón es originario de la ciudad de Managua, de 40 años de edad. Casado y padre de dos hijos. Es de oficio comerciante, se dedica al negocio de pulpería.  Inicio este negocio hace muchos años, como un legado de su mama, quien fundo la pulpería. Actualmente, ha logrado un crecimiento en su negocio, sobre todo mantiene una pulpería rentable y con mucha demanda de clientes. Su meta es mejorar las condiciones de su vivienda e incrementar aun su negocio. Solicita el crédito para la compra de productos como: arroz, frijoles, pan, lácteos entre otros, con el fin de surtir su negocio. Estima que el crédito le será de mucha ayuda ya que obtendrá un nivel de ganancia considerado y aumentar la mercadería de su pulpería. Su plan futuro es seguir creciendo cada vez más su negocio hasta que se convierta en una miscelánea, donde no falte ningún tipo de producto.
texts.en: Ramón is from the city of Managua. He is 40 years old, married and the father of two children. He is a merchant by trade, and works in his convenience store business. He got into this business several years ago as a legacy from his mother, who started the store. Now he has achieved growth in his business and above all maintains a profitable store with a lot of demand from customers. His goal is to improve his living conditions and grow his business more. He is asking for the loan to buy products such as rice, beans, dairy products and more, in order to stock his business. He thinks that the loan will be a big help, since he will obtain a considerable level of earnings and increase the merchandise in his store. His future plan is to keep growing his business more and more until it becomes a variety store that has every type of product.

loans.use: to buy products such as: rice, beans, bread, dairy products and more.

loans.name: Josefa Milagro

texts.es: Josefa es una humilde señora de 55 años de edad, originaria de la ciudad de Jinotega. Madre soltera de dos hijos ya independientes. Es de oficio comerciante, se dedica a la venta de ropa. Sus hijos la apoyan en todo lo que necesita. Este negocio inicio desde hace muchos años, cuando era pequeña y vendía comida en unos de los mercados de la ciudad. A raíz de eso, decidió tener su propio negocio en su vivienda lo cual considero que le generaba más ingresos. Su meta próxima es mejorar la infraestructura de su vivienda. Solicita el crédito para comprar mercadería variada como: camisas, pantalones, faldas entre otros, con el fin de brindar una diversidad de mercadería a sus clientes. Estima que este crédito le será beneficioso ya que tendrá suficiente mercadería para cumplir con la demanda de sus clientes, lo cual le generara un alto nivel de ventas. Su plan futuro extender más su negocio y lograr construir una pulpería.
texts.en: Josefa is a humble 55 year old woman. She is a native of the city of Jinotega. She is a single mother to two children who are independent. She is a merchant dedicated to selling clothing. Her children support her in everything she needs. She started this business many years ago when she was small and she sold food in one of the city's markets. Following that, she decided to have her own business in her house which she considered would generate more income. Her next goal is to improve the infrastructure of her house. She is requesting the loan to buy varied merchandise such as shirts, pants, skirts, among other items with the goal of providing diverse merchandise to her customers. She believes this loan will be beneficial since she will have enough merchandise to meet the demands of her customers which will generate a high level of sales. Her future plan is to extend her business more and complete construction of a grocery shop.

loans.use: to buy varied merchandise like shirts, pants, skirts, among other items.

loans.name: Pedro

texts.es:
Don Pedro es un señor casado de 40  años de edad, quien vive junto a su esposa y sus cinco hijos, ambos ayudan a su padre y estudian, en el Departamento de Sololá.
El actualmente tiene una tienda de abarrotes en el lugar de su vivienda, la cual es una fuente de ingresos económicos para su familia. Comenta que decidió emprender este negocio porque su padre se dedicaba a lo mismo y  es de esta manera como él aprendió este oficio, que hasta el momento le ha generado buenos ingresos y ganancias que le ayudan a contribuir a la economía de su familia.
El ha observado que en esta época del año las ventas incrementan, es por ello que está solicitando un préstamo de Q 5,000.00 para comprar más productos de consumo diario  y  ampliar su tienda de abarrotes, de este modo el puede brindarles un  mejor servicio a sus clientes y obtener mejores ganancias para mantener a su familia.
Su mayor sueño es incrementar sus ganancias y así lograr la construcción de su vivienda para darle una mejorar comodidad a su familia.
texts.en:
Pedro is married, he is 40 years old, and lives in the region of Solola with his wife and 5 children, who study and also help him with the business. He runs a home-based grocery store, which is the main source of income for his family. He decided to work in this field because his father was also in this type of business, and he learned the trade from him. Up until now this activity has generated positive revenue, allowing him to support his family financially.

He has noticed that around this season of the year his sales increase, and for this reason he is requesting a loan of 5000 Quetzales, to buy more daily consumer goods and increase the selection of products in his store. This would help him to offer a greater variety of products to his customers, and ultimately increase the family income.

His biggest dream is to increase his profits to build a home and offer better comfort to his family.

loans.use: to buy groceries to increase the selection of products in his store.

loans.name: Cristhiam Ridoniel

texts.es: Cristhiam tiene 31 años de edad habitante de la comunidad de san remigio  el con esfuerzo de sus padres logro terminar  la primaria  en la escuela de la misma comunidad , después que dejo de estudiar se dedico a trabajar en las fincas cercanas de donde vive y luego consiguió  trabajo en la empresa camaronera  que queda algo cerca de su comunidad, en esta empresa trabajo un par de años y adquirió experiencia,Años mas tardes con un grupo de compañeros de la empresa decidieron crear una cooperativa  de explotación de camarón la que tienen debidamente registrada e inscrita con el nombre de Fuente de vida esta formada por 10 personas todos trabajan en la cooperativa y dividen las ganancias del negocio, este es su medio de subsistencia lo que con la ayuda de Dios pues les va muy bien.El desea mejorar las condiciones de vida de su familia llevando luz a su hogar ya que en la comunidad no hay energía eléctrica es por eso que quiere este crédito para así comprar un sistema solar para su humilde vivienda.
texts.en: Cristhiam is 31 years old and lives in the community of San Remigio. Because of his parents' hard work, he was able to finish primary school in the same community. After leaving school, he started working on farms near to where he lives and later he got a job with a shrimp company that is somewhat close to his community. He worked at that company for a couple of years and acquired experience. Years later, with a group of coworkers, they decided to create a shrimp farm cooperative which is duly registered  with the name of Fuente de Vida. It is made up of 10 people. All of them work in the cooperative  and divide the business' profits. This is how they make their living and with God's help it is going well for them. He wants to improve his family's quality of life by bringing electricity to their home, since in his community there is no electrical power. That is why he wants this loan to buy a solar system for his humble home.

loans.use: to buy a solar system.

loans.name: Rizza

texts.en:
As a married parent of two children, Rizza works hard to support her family.

She has a bicycle transport business in the Philippines, and she also earns additional income from selling ready-to-wear clothing. Rizza is borrowing PHP 7,000 through NWTF to purchase spare parts for the maintenance of her bicycle for her bicycle transport business.

Rizza has been sustaining her business activities through her past three loans from NWTF. She hopes that her hard work will help her to attain her dream of saving enough money to provide a secure future for her family.

loans.use: to purchase spare parts for the maintenance of her bicycle.

loans.name: Clotilde

texts.es:
Cleotilde tiene 52 años de edad, vive junto a su esposo y sus hijos en el distrito de La Matanza, su población se dedica a la agricultura, comercio y ganadería a dos horas de la ciudad de Piura, costa norte del Perú.

Ella se dedica a la venta de chicha de jora, cerveza y comida en su domicilio, es muy conocida en la zona por la labor que realiza, son una familia unida, su esposo brinda servicio de maestro de construcción.

Cleotilde ha solicitado un préstamo de 3 000 nuevos soles para comprar maíz por ocasión para posteriormente ofrecerlo a un mejor precio y de esta manera generar ingresos adicionales para su familia.
texts.en:
Cleotilde is 52 years old. She lives with her husband and children in the La Matanza district. Its residents work in farming, commerce and livestock. It is two hours from the city of Piura, on the northern coast of Peru.

She works selling chicha de jora, beer, and food from her home. She is well known in the area for her work. Her family is close and her husband works in construction. 

Cleotilde has asked for a loan of 3,000 nuevos soles to buy corn in order to offer a better price and in this way generate additional income for her family.

loans.use: to buy corn.

loans.name: Cate

texts.en:
Cate is 32 years old and lives in the town of Mukono in the Mukono region of Uganda. She has 3 children who are all currently in school.

For the past 3 years, Cate has been working hard to manage her restaurant, which sells snacks, food, and tea. 

To help expand her business, Cate has requested a loan of 2,000,000 Ugandan shillings from BRAC Uganda. The loan will be used to buy missing items for outside catering, and will help Cate to generate greater profits and educate her children. Cate hopes that, in the future, she will be able to grow to a hotel level. 

Cate is a member of BRAC's Small Enterprise Program (SEP).  The program primarily serves small entrepreneurs like Cate who do not have enough collateral for commercial loans, but have businesses that have grown too large for microloans.

loans.use: to buy missing items for outside catering

loans.name: David Enrique

texts.es:
David de 35 años de edad, estudio hasta 8° grado, es casado, su esposa se dedica a los oficios domésticos, tiene una hija de 7 años que estudia en la escuela 2 grado.

David, trabaja de panadero tiene 5 años que desempeña esa actividad, le gusto la forma como se hace el pan y una buena manera de ganar dinero para sus ingresos de la familia.


El préstamo que esta solicitando, es para comprar un molino, tendrá mejores ingresos y podrá cubrir más necesidades de su hogar y familia.

Su deseo es, que su familia tenga las herramientas para trabajar y enseñarles a sus hijos un oficio; para  trabajar y ganarse el dinero honradamente, por si sus hijos no quisieran seguir estudiando o por si sus ingresos no fueran suficientes.
texts.en:
David is 35 years old and went to school until 8th grade. His wife takes care of the household chores and they have a 7-year-old daughter who is in grade 2 at school.

David is a baker and has worked in this profession for five years. He likes the way the bread is made and it is a good way to earn money for the expenses of his family.

He is asking for a loan in order to buy a flour mill, which would enable him to have more income and to cover the household expenses of his family. 

His wants his family to have all the tools they need for their work and to be able to teach his children a trade. He wants his children to be able to work and to earn money honestly, in case they do not want to continue their studies or their income is not sufficient.

loans.use: to buy a flour mill.

loans.name: Marpatkhan

texts.ru: Марпатхан 53 года, вдова, одна воспитала 3 детей, дочери замужем и проживают отдельно, сыну 16 лет, проживает с мамой и помогает ей по хозяйству. У Марпатхан - среднее образование, в качестве основного дохода для своей семьи Марпатхан занимается животноводством, стартовав 23 года назад, с покупки скота на 3,000 сом KGS. Благодаря упорному труду Марпатхан и ее сына, в ее хозяйстве на сегодняшний день имеется: 6 дойных коров, 30 овец. Марпатхан доит коров и сдает молоко реализаторам, сын занимается закупом сена и кормов для скота. Ежемесячный доход составляет 5,000 сом (KGS). Марпатхан входит в группу "Кызыл-Кыя", в эту группу входят еще 2 человека. Марпатхан является третьим членом группы. В целях дальнейшего развития своего хозяйства, Марпатхан обратилась в Микрофинансовый банк «Бай –Тушум и Партнеры» за кредитом в сумме 100,000 сом (KGS) на покупку нетелей для увеличения поголовья скота. Доходы от кредита Марпатхан планирует вложить в дальнейшее приумножение количества домашней скотины, и планирует накопить средства на ремонт дома, в котором проживает в настоящее время.
texts.en: Marpatkhan is 53 years old, widowed, and raised three children by herself. Her daughters are married and live seperately. Her son is 16 years old, lives with her and helps her with her farming. Marpatkhan has a secondary education. As the main source of income for her family, Marpatkhan practices livestock breeding. She started this business 23 years ago, with an initial purchase of cattle in the amount of 3,000 som (KGS). Thanks to the hard work of Marpatkhan and her son, she currently has 6 milk cows and 30 sheep on her farm. Marpatkhan milks the cows and sells the milk, while her son buys the hay and feeds the livestock. Her monthly income is 5,000 som (KGS). Marpatkhan is in the farming group "Kyzyl-Kiya." This group already has two members in it; Marpatkhan is the third member. For the purpose of further developing her business, Marpatkhan turned to Microfinance Bank "Bai Tushum and Partners." She is requesting a loan in the amount of 100,000 som (KGS) to buy heifers to increase the size of her herd. Marpatkhan plans to invest the earnings from the loan in the further acquisition of livestock. She also intends to save money to renovate the house she currently lives in.

loans.use: to buy heifers.

loans.name: Than

texts.en:
A local villager from the Bovel district of Battambang province, Than is 53 years old and blessed with five children.  Her entire household relies on a single business, rice farming on a one-and-a-half hectare area which has returned her about 75,000 KHR per day.

The main challenge for her business is the shortage of working capital to support her agribusiness. Hence, she applies for her first loan to pay for plowing fees, to buy fertilizer and rice seeds, and to pay for labor costs. She hopes that she can gain triple yield from her crop so that she can gain a good income.

loans.use: to pay for plowing fees, to buy fertilizer and rice seeds, and to pay for labor costs

loans.name: Rosalinda

texts.en:
Rosalinda works hard to support her family. She is married and has a fish vending business in the Philippines.

Rosalinda requested a 12,000 PHP loan through NWTF to buy more fish to sell. She has been in this business for 10 years now.

In the future, Rosalinda would like to save enough money so she could afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to buy more fish to sell

loans.name: Hen

texts.en:
Hen is 53 years old and the mother of six children, three of whom still count on her currently. To overcome her family’s hardship, she does paddy rice farming and sells porridge in the local area of Kampong Cham province’s Tbaung Khmum district. It is a business that she has managed since she was 20 years old and it has returned her about 10 USD per day, and about 6 USD per day after taking off the necessary expenses.

Hen is in her second loan cycle as a client with VisonFund (Kiva’s partner). The past loan, which she has fully paid back, has supported her business and stabilized her living conditions quickly.

Besides her business, she wants to focus on her kids' future, too. Hence, she applied for an education loan to cover the tuition fees for her daughter, who wants to pursue a bachelor degree majoring in Civil Engineering. She hopes that her daughter can reach her dream and get a good job after graduation.

loans.use: to cover the tuition fee for her daughter

location.town: Kampong Cham province, Tbaung Khmum district

loans.name: Haimurot

texts.ru: Хаймурот 49-летний житель района Кубадиён. Он является главой дехканского хозяйства, который состоит из 3,60 га земельного участка. Из этого участка только 3,24 га является орошаемым, 0,23 га пастбищем,а остальные части находятся под водой. Хаймурот вместе с четырьмя рабочими выращивает на 3,24 га земли овощи, хлопок и пшеницу. В данный момент Хаймурот собирается параллельно начать бизнес по откорму и продаже скота, так как в его дехканском хозяйстве имеется большой участок пастбища. Это означает что у него не будет проблем с кормом и на зиму он уже запасся огромным количеством корма. Хаймурот обратился за кредитом, чтобы купить крупнорогатый скот. Он планирует каждый месяц покупать по трех голов бычков с рынка Кубадиён, откармливать в течение 25-30 дней и продавать с наценкой на том же рынке. Если он начнет этот бизнес, у него будет дополнительный стабильный доход, что позволит его семье жить лучше.
texts.en: Haimurot is a 49-year-old resident of the Qubadiyon District. He is the head of a communal farm which is made up of a 3.6 hectare plot of land. Of this whole plot, only 3.24 hectares are irrigated, 0.23 hectares are grazing pastures and the remaining parts are under water. Haimurot, along with four other field hands, grow vegetables, cotton and wheat on 3.24 hectares of land. Currently, Haimurot is planning to simultaneously start his own business fattening up and reselling cattle as his communal farm has a big plot for grazing. This means that there will not be a problem with feeding them. He has already been storing up a huge amount of feed for them for winter. Haimurot is requesting a loan to buy cattle. He plans to buy three bulls every month from the Qubadiyon market, fatten them up over the course of 25-30 days, and resell them at a mark-up at the very same market. If he is able to start this business, he will have an additional, stabile income which will allow his family to live better.

loans.use: to buy three bulls in order to start his business of fattening up and reselling cattle.

loans.name: Dariko

texts.en:
Dariko, age 41, is from the Khelvachauri District. She is married with two grown sons. The family runs a small-scale agricultural business to earn a living. Specifically, Dariko grows citrus in her own garden and sells seasonally to local retailers.  Moreover, Dariko breeds milk cows and sells the received milk from her house. Her earnings are hardly enough to cover the food and household costs for the family of four.

In order to generate income, Dariko and her husband plan to start an additional business. With the loan amount, she will purchase a mini-bus which will mainly be used by Dariko’s husband on a mini-bus line. He will transport passengers from his district to a neighboring town and earn a daily income. Now is the high season for citrus harvest, so Dariko and her spouse will also use the mini-bus for making citrus deliveries. They will save on transportation costs and generate good income from the agricultural business as well.

Dariko hopes this family initiative will be lucrative and be able to increase their funds. Dariko and her family members are waiting for your generosity.

loans.use: to buy a mini-bus for her husband to start working on a mini-bus line

loans.name: Leonor

texts.es: Leonor es una mujer alegre, entusiasta y perseverante que está feliz y contenta con el anterior crédito que se prestó, ella sigue viviendo en la ciudad de Paucartambo y continua enseñando en uno de los colegio de la zona y le va muy bien gracias al empeño que pone en su trabajo. Ella agradece a todos los inversionistas por el apoyo brindado y va continuar participando en el banco comunal “Santa Ana” y esta oportunidad requiere el préstamo para el mantenimiento de su casa pues va refaccionar el techo ya que se están acercando las lluvias y se compromete a cumplir con el pago de sus cuotas mensuales con mucha responsabilidad.
texts.en:
Leonor is a cheerful, enthusiastic and persevering woman who is happy and content with the previous loan she took out. She still lives in the city of Paucartambo, continues to teach at a local school and is doing very well thanks to the efforts she puts into her work.

She thanks all lenders for their support and will continue to participate in the "Santa Ana" communal bank. On this occasion she needs a loan in order to maintain her house. She wants to repair her roof because the rains are approaching.

She commits to make her monthly payments very responsibly.

loans.use: to maintain her house because she wants to repair the roof.

loans.name: Hukminiso

texts.ru: Хукминисо трудолюбивая женщина. Она родилась в 1960 года. Она замужем и имеет 3 детей. Дети совершеннолетние. Ее муж мастер по ремонту дома. Хукминисо занимается шитьем женской одежды. Она покупает ткани с рынка, шьёт женские платья и продает своим клиентам. Она также предоставляет услугу швеи. Ее клиенты довольны ее услугами. Хукминисо и ее семья живут в маленьком доме, который имеет плохое состояние. Она обратилась в ИМОН с целью получения займа. Она запрашивает займ на сумму 7000 сомони для покупки строительных материалов как цемент, древесина, краски и т.п. для ремонта дома. Она ждет вашу доброту.
texts.en: Hukminiso is a hardworking woman. She was born in 1960. She is married and has 3 children. Her children are all grown up. Her husband is an expert in home repair. Hukminiso sews women's clothing. She buys fabric at the market, sews women's dresses and sells them to her clients. She also offers seamstress services. Her clients are happy with her work. Hukminiso and her family live in a small house which is in a state of disrepair. She turned to IMON to obtain a loan. She is requesting a loan in the amount of 7000 somoni to buy construction materials such as cement, lumber, paint, etc. to repair her house. She awaits your kindness.

loans.use: To buy building materials as cement, lumber and paint for repairing her house.

loans.name: Herman

texts.es:
Hernan vive en la ciudad de Pucallpa y trabaja en su parcela como agricultor, a Hernan le gusta mucho lo que hace es por ello que le dedica a su cultivo alrededor de 9 horas, ya que con el fruto de su trabajo puede sacar adelante a su familia.
